atk-s0508a11:3_0: Idāni channāme kuṭikātiādinayappavattānaṁ theragāthānaṁ atthavaṇṇanā hoti. Sā panāyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:3_1: atthavaṇṇanā yasmā tāsaṁ tāsaṁ gāthānaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ pakāsetvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti
atk-s0508a11:3_2: suviññeyyā ca. Tasmā tattha tattha aṭṭhuppattiṁ pakāsetvā atthavaṇṇanaṁ karissāmāti.
atk-s0508a11:4_0: Tattha channā me kuṭikātigāthāya kā uppatti? Vuccate – ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0508a11:4_1: anuppanneyeva padumuttare bhagavati lokanāthe haṁsavatīnāmake nagare aññatarassa
atk-s0508a11:4_2: brāhmaṇamahāsālassa eko putto uppajji. Tassa ‘‘nandamāṇavo’’ti nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a11:4_3: tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṁ apassanto attano parivārabhūtehi catucattālīsāya
atk-s0508a11:4_4: māṇavakasahassehi saddhiṁ pabbatapāde isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca
atk-s0508a11:4_5: ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi. Antevāsikānampi kammaṭṭhānaṁ ācikkhi. Tepi na cireneva jhānalābhino ahesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:5_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā haṁsavatīnagaraṁ upanissāya
atk-s0508a11:5_1: viharanto ekadivasaṁ paccūsasamaye lokaṁ volokento nandatāpasassa antevāsikajaṭilānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:5_2: arahattūpanissayaṁ nandatāpasassa ca dvīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāvakaṭṭhānantarassa
atk-s0508a11:5_3: patthanaṁ disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṁ katvā pubbaṇhasamaye pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0508a11:5_4: aññaṁ kañci anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro nandatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya
atk-s0508a11:5_5: gatesu ‘‘buddhabhāvaṁ me jānātū’’ti passantasseva nandatāpasassa ākāsato otaritvā
atk-s0508a11:5_6: pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāsi. Nandatāpaso buddhānubhāvañceva lakkhaṇapāripūriñca disvā lakkhaṇamante
atk-s0508a11:5_7: sammasitvā ‘‘imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato nāma agāraṁ ajjhāvasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0508a11:5_8: pabbajanto loke vivaṭacchado sabbaññū buddho hoti. Ayaṁ purisājānīyo nissaṁsayaṁ
atk-s0508a11:5_9: buddhoti ñatvā paccuggamanaṁ katvā, pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, āsanaṁ paññāpetvā,
atk-s0508a11:5_10: adāsi. Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Nandatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:6_0: Tasmiṁ samaye catucattālīsasahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā
atk-s0508a11:6_1: ācariyassa santikaṁ sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnāsanaṁ olokentā āhaṁsu
atk-s0508a11:6_2: – ‘‘ācariya, mayaṁ ‘imasmiṁ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma, ayaṁ pana
atk-s0508a11:6_3: puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe’’ti. Nandatāpaso, ‘‘tātā, kiṁ vadetha, sāsapena
atk-s0508a11:6_4: saddhiṁ aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassayojanubbedhaṁ sineruṁ upametuṁ icchatha, sabbaññubuddhena
atk-s0508a11:6_5: saddhiṁ mā maṁ upamitthā’’ti āha. Atha te tāpasā ‘‘sace ayaṁ orako abhavissa, na
atk-s0508a11:6_6: amhākaṁ ācariyo evaṁ upamaṁ āhareyya, yāva mahā vatāyaṁ purisājānīyo’’ti pādesu nipatitvā
atk-s0508a11:6_7: sirasā vandiṁsu. Atha te ācariyo āha – ‘‘tātā, amhākaṁ buddhānaṁ anucchaviko deyyadhammo
atk-s0508a11:6_8: natthi, bhagavā ca bhikkhācāravelāyaṁ idhāgato, tasmā mayaṁ yathābalaṁ deyyadhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:6_9: dassāma, tumhe yaṁ yaṁ paṇītaṁ phalāphalaṁ ānītaṁ, taṁ taṁ āharathā’’ti vatvā āharāpetvā
atk-s0508a11:6_10: hatthe dhovitvā sayaṁ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte
atk-s0508a11:6_11: devatā dibbojaṁ pakkhipiṁsu. Tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. Tato bhojanakiccaṁ
atk-s0508a11:6_12: niṭṭhāpetvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:6_13: kathaṁ kathento nisīdi. Satthā ‘‘bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū’’ti cintesi. Bhikkhū satthu
atk-s0508a11:6_14: cittaṁ ñatvā satasahassamattā khīṇāsavā āgantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:7_0: Nandatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi – ‘‘tātā, buddhānaṁ nisinnāsanampi nīcaṁ, samaṇasatasahassassapi
atk-s0508a11:7_1: āsanaṁ natthi, tumhehi ajja uḷāraṁ bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca sakkāraṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭati
atk-s0508a11:7_2: , pabbatapādato vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharathā’’ti. Acinteyyattā iddhivisayassa
atk-s0508a11:7_3: muhutteneva vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhānaṁ yojanappamāṇaṁ pupphāsanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:7_4: paññāpesuṁ. Aggasāvakānaṁ tigāvutaṁ, sesabhikkhūnaṁ aḍḍhayojanikādibhedaṁ, saṅghanavakassa
atk-s0508a11:7_5: usabhamattaṁ ahosi. Evaṁ paññattesu āsanesu nandatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṁ
atk-s0508a11:7_6: paggayha ṭhito, ‘‘bhante, mayhaṁ dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāya imaṁ pupphāsanaṁ abhiruhathā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:7_7: āha. Nisīdi bhagavā pupphāsane. Evaṁ nisinne satthari satthu ākāraṁ ñatvā bhikkhū
atk-s0508a11:7_8: attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṁsu. Nandatāpaso mahantaṁ pupphachattaṁ gahetvā tathāgatassa
atk-s0508a11:7_9: matthake dhārento aṭṭhāsi. Satthā ‘‘tāpasānaṁ ayaṁ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū’’ti nirodhasamāpattiṁ
atk-s0508a11:7_10: samāpajji. Satthu samāpannabhāvaṁ ñatvā bhikkhūpi samāpajjiṁsu. Tathāgate sattāhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:7_11: nirodhaṁ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṁ
atk-s0508a11:7_12: paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṁ añjaliṁ paggayha tiṭṭhanti. Nandatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi
atk-s0508a11:7_13: agantvā pupphachattaṁ dhārento sattāhaṁ pītisukheneva vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a11:8_0: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya araṇavihāriaṅgena dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṁ
atk-s0508a11:8_1: ekaṁ sāvakaṁ ‘‘isigaṇassa pupphāsanānumodanaṁ karohī’’ti āṇāpesi. So cakkavattirañño
atk-s0508a11:8_2: santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso attano visaye ṭhatvā tepiṭakaṁ
atk-s0508a11:8_3: buddhavacanaṁ sammasitvā anumodanaṁ akāsi. Tassa desanāvasāne satthā sayaṁ dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:8_4: desesi. Desanāpariyosāne sabbe catucattālīsasahassatāpasā arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu. Satthā
atk-s0508a11:8_5: ‘‘etha, bhikkhavo’’ti hatthaṁ pasāresi. Tesaṁ tāvadeva kesamassu antaradhāyi. Aṭṭha
atk-s0508a11:8_6: parikkhārā kāye paṭimukkāva ahesuṁ saṭṭhivassattherā viya satthāraṁ parivārayiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:8_7: Nandatāpaso pana vikkhittacittatāya visesaṁ nādhigacchi. Tassa kira araṇavihārittherassa
atk-s0508a11:8_8: santike dhammaṁ sotuṁ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya ‘‘aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa
atk-s0508a11:8_9: sāsane iminā sāvakena laddhadhuraṁ labheyya’’nti cittaṁ udapādi. So tena parivitakkena
atk-s0508a11:8_10: maggaphalapaṭivedhaṁ kātuṁ nāsakkhi. Tathāgataṁ pana vanditvā sammukhe ṭhatvā āha
atk-s0508a11:8_11: – ‘‘bhante, yena bhikkhunā isigaṇassa pupphāsanānumodanā katā, ko nāmāyaṁ tumhākaṁ
atk-s0508a11:8_12: sāsane’’ti. ‘‘Araṇavihāriaṅge dakkhiṇeyyaaṅge ca etadaggaṁ patto eso bhikkhū’’ti.
atk-s0508a11:8_13: ‘‘Bhante, yvāyaṁ mayā sattāhaṁ pupphachattaṁ dhārentena sakkāro kato, tena adhikārena
atk-s0508a11:8_14: na aññaṁ sampattiṁ patthemi, anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṁ thero viya
atk-s0508a11:9_0: Satthā ‘‘samijjhissati nu, kho imassa tāpasassa patthanā’’ti anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ pesetvā
atk-s0508a11:9_1: olokento kappasatasahassaṁ atikkamitvā samijjhanakabhāvaṁ disvā nandatāpasaṁ āha
atk-s0508a11:9_2: – ‘‘na te ayaṁ patthanā moghā bhavissati, anāgate kappasatasahassaṁ atikkamitvā gotamo
atk-s0508a11:9_3: nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa santike samijjhissatī’’ti vatvā dhammakathaṁ kathetvā
atk-s0508a11:9_4: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṁ pakkhandi. Nandatāpaso yāva cakkhupathasamatikkamā satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:9_5: bhikkhusaṅghañca uddissa añjaliṁ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. So aparabhāge kālena kālaṁ satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:9_6: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ suṇi. Aparihīnajjhānova kālaṅkatvā brahmaloke nibbatto. Tato
atk-s0508a11:9_7: pana cuto aparānipi pañca jātisatāni pabbajitvā āraññako ahosi. Kassapasammāsambuddhakālepi
atk-s0508a11:9_8: pabbajitvā āraññako hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūresi. Etaṁ kira vattaṁ aparipūretvā
atk-s0508a11:9_9: mahāsāvakabhāvaṁ pāpuṇantā nāma natthi. Gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pana āgamaṭṭhakathāsu
atk-s0508a11:9_10: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. So vīsativassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūretvā kālaṅkatvā
atk-s0508a11:9_11: kāmāvacaradevaloke tāvatiṁsabhavane nibbatti. Vuttañhetaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.3.151) –
atk-s0508a11:14: ‘‘Phalaṁ mūlañca paṇṇañca, na bhuñjāmi ahaṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a11:21: Muyhase mohanīye ca, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:23: Mā kho visuddhaṁ dūsesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:25: Ubhopi mā virādhesi, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:27: Neva gāme araññe vā, na hi taṁ kaṭṭhasammataṁ.
atk-s0508a11:28: ‘‘Chavālātūpamo tvaṁ si, na gihī nāpi saññato;
atk-s0508a11:29: Ubhato muttako ajja, nikkhamassu vanā tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:30: ‘‘Siyā nu kho tava etaṁ, ko pajānāti te idaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:35: Saṁvāsaṁ alabhanto hi, kathaṁ jīvihisi tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:37: Balī nāgo upagantvā, yūthā nīharate gajaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:38: ‘‘Yūthā vinissaṭo santo, sukhaṁ sātaṁ na vindati;
atk-s0508a11:41: Tehi tvaṁ nissaṭo santo, sukhaṁ sātaṁ na lacchasi.
atk-s0508a11:45: Tathā sīlavīhino tvaṁ, na jhāyissasi katthaci.
atk-s0508a11:47: Mattikaṁ pettikañcāpi, natthi te nihitaṁ dhanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:49: Evaṁ jīvihisi gehe, sādhu te taṁ na ruccati.
atk-s0508a11:63: Maṇi yathā jotiraso, ākāse caṅkamī tadā.
atk-s0508a11:67: Devo nu kho ayaṁ satto, udāhu manujo ayaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:68: ‘‘Na me suto vā diṭṭho vā, mahiyā ediso naro;
atk-s0508a11:69: Api mantapadaṁ atthi, ayaṁ satthā bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:89: Bhoge te ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:91: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:95: Subhūti nāma nāmena, hessasi satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a11:109: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhānussatiyā phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:114: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā subhūtitthero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
atk-s0508a11:115_0: Evaṁ pana so tāvatiṁsabhavane aparāparaṁ uppajjanavasena dibbasampattiṁ anubhavitvā
atk-s0508a11:115_1: tato cuto manussaloke anekasatakkhattuṁ cakkavattirājā ca padesarājā ca hutvā uḷāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:115_2: manussasampattiṁ anubhavitvā atha amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṁ sumanaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0508a11:115_3: gehe anāthapiṇḍikassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti ‘‘subhūtī’’tissa nāmaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:116_0: Tena ca samayena amhākaṁ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0508a11:116_1: rājagahaṁ gantvā tattha veḷuvanapaṭiggahaṇādinā lokānuggahaṁ karonto rājagahaṁ upanissāya
atk-s0508a11:116_2: sītavane viharati. Tadā anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi sāvatthiyaṁ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0508a11:116_3: attano sahāyassa rājagahaseṭṭhino gharaṁ gato buddhuppādaṁ sutvā satthāraṁ sītavane
atk-s0508a11:116_4: viharantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṁ sāvatthiṁ
atk-s0508a11:116_5: āgamanatthāya yācitvā tato pañcacattālīsayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccāgena
atk-s0508a11:116_6: vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā sāvatthiyaṁ rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṁ jetassa rājakumārassa
atk-s0508a11:116_7: uyyānabhūmiṁ koṭisanthārena kiṇitvā tattha bhagavato vihāraṁ kāretvā adāsi. Vihārapariggahaṇadivase
atk-s0508a11:116_8: ayaṁ subhūtikuṭumbiko anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhinā saddhiṁ gantvā dhammaṁ suṇanto saddhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:116_9: paṭilabhitvā pabbaji . So upasampajjitvā dve mātikā paguṇā katvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ kathāpetvā
atk-s0508a11:116_10: araññe samaṇadhammaṁ karonto mettājhānapādakaṁ vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:116_11: So dhammaṁ desento yasmā satthārā desitaniyāmena anodissakaṁ katvā dhammaṁ deseti.
atk-s0508a11:116_12: Tasmā araṇavihārīnaṁ aggo nāma jāto. Piṇḍāya caranto ghare ghare mettājhānaṁ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0508a11:116_13: vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti ‘‘evaṁ dāyakānaṁ mahapphalaṁ bhavissatī’’ti. Tasmā
atk-s0508a11:116_14: dakkhiṇeyyānaṁ aggo nāma jāto. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:116_15: bhikkhūnaṁ araṇavihārīnaṁ yadidaṁ subhūti, dakkhiṇeyyānaṁ yadidaṁ subhūtī’’ti (a.
atk-s0508a11:116_16: ni. 1.198, 201). Evamayaṁ mahāthero arahatte patiṭṭhāya attanā pūritapāramīnaṁ phalassa
atk-s0508a11:116_17: matthakaṁ patvā loke abhiññāto abhilakkhito hutvā bahujanahitāya janapadacārikaṁ
atk-s0508a11:117_0: Rājā bimbisāro therassa āgamanaṁ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ‘‘idheva, bhante, vasathā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:117_1: vatvā ‘‘nivāsanaṭṭhānaṁ karissāmī’’ti pakkanto vissari. Thero senāsanaṁ alabhanto
atk-s0508a11:117_2: abbhokāse vītināmesi. Therassa ānubhāvena devo na vassati. Manussā avuṭṭhitāya upaddutā
atk-s0508a11:117_3: rañño nivesanadvāre ukkuṭṭhimakaṁsu. Rājā ‘‘kena nu kho kāraṇena devo na vassatī’’ti
atk-s0508a11:117_4: vīmaṁsanto ‘‘therassa abbhokāsavāsena maññe na vassatī’’ti cintetvā tassa paṇṇakuṭiṁ
atk-s0508a11:117_5: kārāpetvā ‘‘imissā, bhante, paṇṇakuṭiyā vasathā’’ti vatvā vanditvā pakkāmi. Thero
atk-s0508a11:117_6: kuṭikaṁ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārake pallaṅkena nisīdi. Tadā pana devo thokaṁ thokaṁ
atk-s0508a11:117_7: phusāyati, na sammā dhāraṁ anuppavecchati. Atha thero lokassa avuṭṭhikabhayaṁ visamitukāmo
atk-s0508a11:119: ‘‘Channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā, vassa deva yathāsukhaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:120: Cittaṁ me susamāhitaṁ vimuttaṁ, ātāpī viharāmi vassa devā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a11:122_0: Tattha channa-saddo tāva ‘‘channā sā kumārikā imassa kumārakassa’’ (pārā. 296) ‘‘nacchannaṁ
atk-s0508a11:122_1: nappatirūpa’’ntiādīsu (pārā. 383) patirūpe āgato. ‘‘Channaṁ tveva, phagguṇa, phassāyatanāna’’ntiādīsu
atk-s0508a11:122_3: 45; cūḷava. 385) gahaṇe. ‘‘Kyāhaṁ te nacchannopi karissāmī’’tiādīsu nivāsanapārupane
atk-s0508a11:122_5: sabbaparicchannaṁ (pāci. 52, 54), channā kuṭi āhito ginī’’ti (su. ni. 18) ca ādīsu
atk-s0508a11:122_6: tiṇādīhi chādane. Idhāpi tiṇādīhi chādaneyeva daṭṭhabbo, tasmā tiṇena vā paṇṇena
atk-s0508a11:122_7: vā channā yathā na vassati vassodakapatanaṁ na hoti na ovassati, evaṁ sammadeva chāditāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:123_0: Me-saddo ‘‘kicchena me adhigataṁ, halaṁ dāni pakāsitu’’ntiādīsu (mahāva. 8; dī. ni.
atk-s0508a11:123_1: 2.65; ma. ni. 1.281; 2.337; saṁ. ni. 1.172) karaṇe āgato, mayāti attho. ‘‘Tassa me,
atk-s0508a11:123_2: bhante, bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetū’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni. 3.182; a. ni. 4.257)
atk-s0508a11:123_3: sampadāne, mayhanti attho. ‘‘Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva
atk-s0508a11:123_4: sato’’ādīsu (ma. ni. 1.206; saṁ. ni. 4.14) sāmiatthe āgato. Idhāpi sāmiatthe eva
atk-s0508a11:123_5: daṭṭhabbo, mamāti attho. Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavānaṁ mamāyitabbaṁ nāma kiñci natthi lokadhammehi
atk-s0508a11:123_6: anupalittabhāvato, lokasamaññāvasena pana tesampi ‘‘ahaṁ mamā’’ti vohāramattaṁ hoti.
atk-s0508a11:123_7: Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ, no āmisadāyādā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.29).
atk-s0508a11:124: Kuṭikāti pana mātukucchipi karajakāyopi tiṇādicchadano patissayopi vuccati. Tathā hi –
atk-s0508a11:126: Putte santānake brūsi, taṇhā me brūsi bandhana’’nti. (saṁ. ni. 1.19) –
atk-s0508a11:130_0: Ādīsu kesādisamūhabhūto karajakāyo. ‘‘Kassapassa bhagavato bhagini kuṭi ovassati’’
atk-s0508a11:130_1: (ma. ni. 2.291) ‘‘kuṭi nāma ullittā vā hoti avalittā vā’’tiādīsu (pārā. 349) tiṇachadanapatissayo.
atk-s0508a11:130_2: Idhāpi so eva veditabbo paṇṇasālāya adhippetattā. Kuṭi eva hi kuṭikā, apākaṭakuṭi ‘‘kuṭikā’’ti vuttā.
atk-s0508a11:131_0: Sukha-saddo pana ‘‘vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṁ dukhañca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassa’’ntiādīsu
atk-s0508a11:131_1: (su. ni. 67) sukhavedanāyaṁ āgato. ‘‘Sukho buddhānamuppādo, sukhā saddhammadesanā’’tiādīsu
atk-s0508a11:131_2: (dha. pa. 194) sukhamūle. ‘‘Sukhassetaṁ, bhikkhave, adhivacanaṁ yadidaṁ puññānī’’tiādīsu
atk-s0508a11:131_3: (a. ni. 7.62; itivu. 22) sukhahetumhi. ‘‘Yasmā ca, kho, mahāli, rūpaṁ sukhaṁ sukhānupatitaṁ
atk-s0508a11:131_5: cunda, ariyassa vinaye’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.82) abyāpajje. ‘‘Nibbānaṁ paramaṁ sukha’’ntiādīsu
atk-s0508a11:131_6: (ma. ni. 2.215; dha. pa. 203-204) nibbāne. ‘‘Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, na sukaraṁ akkhānena
atk-s0508a11:131_7: pāpuṇituṁ yāva sukhā saggā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 3.225) sukhappaccayaṭṭhāne. ‘‘Sovaggikaṁ
atk-s0508a11:131_8: sukhavipākaṁ saggasaṁvattanika’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.163; saṁ. ni. 1.130) iṭṭhe, piyamanāpeti
atk-s0508a11:131_9: attho. Idhāpi iṭṭhe sukhappaccaye vā daṭṭhabbo. Sā hi kuṭi anto bahi ca manāpabhāvena
atk-s0508a11:131_10: sampāditā nivāsanaphāsutāya ‘‘sukhā’’ti vuttā. Tathā nātisītanātiuṇhatāya utusukhasampattiyogena
atk-s0508a11:132_0: Nivātāti avātā, phusitaggaḷapihitavātapānattā vātaparissayarahitāti attho. Idaṁ tassā
atk-s0508a11:132_1: kuṭikā sukhabhāvavibhāvanaṁ. Savāte hi senāsane utusappāyo na labbhati, nivāte so
atk-s0508a11:132_2: labbhatīti. Vassāti pavassa sammā dhāraṁ anuppaveccha. Devāti ayaṁ deva-saddo ‘‘imāni
atk-s0508a11:132_3: te, deva, caturāsīti nagarasahassāni kusavatīrājadhānippamukhāni, ettha , deva, chandaṁ
atk-s0508a11:132_4: janehi jīvite apekkha’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.266) sammutideve khattiye āgato. ‘‘Cātumahārājikā
atk-s0508a11:132_5: devā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 3.337) upapattidevesu. ‘‘Tassa devātidevassa,
atk-s0508a11:132_6: sāsanaṁ sabbadassino’’tiādīsu visuddhidevesu . Visuddhidevānañhi bhagavato atidevabhāve
atk-s0508a11:132_7: vutte itaresaṁ vutto eva hoti. ‘‘Viddhe vigatavalāhake deve’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.486;
atk-s0508a11:132_8: saṁ. ni. 1.110; itivu. 27) ākāse. ‘‘Devo ca kālena kālaṁ na sammā dhāraṁ anuppavecchatī’’tiādīsu
atk-s0508a11:132_9: (a. ni. 4.70) meghe pajjunne vā. Idhāpi meghe pajjunne vā daṭṭhabbo. Vassāti hi te
atk-s0508a11:132_10: āṇāpento thero ālapati. Yathāsukhanti yathāruciṁ. Tava vassanena mayhaṁ bāhiro parissayo
atk-s0508a11:132_11: natthi, tasmā yathākāmaṁ vassāti vassūpajīvisatte anuggaṇhanto vadati.
atk-s0508a11:133_0: Idāni abbhantare parissayābhāvaṁ dassento ‘‘citta’’ntiādimāha. Tattha cittaṁ me susamāhitanti
atk-s0508a11:133_1: mama cittaṁ suṭṭhu ativiya sammā sammadeva ekaggabhāvena ārammaṇe ṭhapitaṁ. Tañca
atk-s0508a11:133_2: kho na nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanamattena; api ca kho vimuttaṁ orambhāgiyauddhaṁbhāgiyasaṅgahehi
atk-s0508a11:133_3: sabbasaṁyojanehi sabbakilesadhammato ca visesena vimuttaṁ, samucchedappahānavasena
atk-s0508a11:133_4: paṭipassaddhippahānavasena te pajahitvā ṭhitanti attho. Ātāpīti vīriyavā. Phalasamāpattiatthaṁ
atk-s0508a11:133_6: dibbavihārādīhi attabhāvaṁ pavattemi, na pana kilesappahānatthaṁ, pahātabbasseva
atk-s0508a11:133_7: abhāvatoti adhippāyo. ‘‘Yathā pana bāhiraparissayābhāvena, deva, mayā tvaṁ vassane
atk-s0508a11:133_8: niyojito, evaṁ abbhantaraparissayābhāvenapī’’ti dassento punapi ‘‘vassa, devā’’ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:134_0: Aparo nayo channāti chāditā pihitā. Kuṭikāti attabhāvo. So hi ‘‘anekāvayavassa samudāyassa
atk-s0508a11:134_1: avijjānīvaraṇassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa taṇhāsaṁyuttassa ayañceva kāyo samudāgato,
atk-s0508a11:134_2: bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa’’ntiādīsu (saṁ. ni. 2.19) kāyoti āgato. ‘‘Siñca, bhikkhu, imaṁ
atk-s0508a11:134_3: nāvaṁ , sittā te lahumessatī’’tiādīsu (dha. pa. 66) nāvāti āgato. ‘‘Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi,
atk-s0508a11:134_4: gahakūṭaṁ visaṅkhata’’nti (dha. pa. 154) ca ādīsu gahanti āgato. ‘‘Satto guhāyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:134_5: bahunābhichanno, tiṭṭhaṁ naro mohanasmiṁ pagāḷho’’tiādīsu (su. ni. 778) guhāti āgato.
atk-s0508a11:134_6: ‘‘Nelaṅgo setapacchādo, ekāro vattatī ratho’’tiādīsu (udā. 65) rathoti āgato. ‘‘Puna
atk-s0508a11:134_7: gehaṁ na kāhasī’’tiādīsu (dha. pa. 154) gehanti āgato. ‘‘Vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto ginī’’tiādīsu
atk-s0508a11:134_8: (su. ni. 19) kuṭīti āgato. Tasmā idhāpi so ‘‘kuṭikā’’ti vutto. Attabhāvo hi kaṭṭhādīni
atk-s0508a11:134_9: paṭicca labbhamānā gehanāmikā kuṭikā viya aṭṭhiādisaññite pathavīdhātuādike phassādike
atk-s0508a11:134_10: ca paṭicca labbhamāno ‘‘kuṭikā’’ti vutto, cittamakkaṭassa nivāsabhāvato ca. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a11:138_0: Sā panesā attabhāvakuṭikā therassa tiṇṇaṁ channaṁ aṭṭhannañca asaṁvaradvārānaṁ vasena
atk-s0508a11:138_1: samati vijjhanakassa rāgādiavassutassa paññāya saṁvutattā sammadeva pihitattā ‘‘channā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:138_2: vuttā. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘sotānaṁ saṁvaraṁ brūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare’’ti (su. ni.
atk-s0508a11:138_3: 1041). Vuttanayena channattā eva kilesadukkhābhāvato nirāmisasukhasamaṅgitāya ca
atk-s0508a11:138_4: sukhā sukhappattā, tato eva ca nivātā nihatamānamadathambhasārambhatāya nivātavuttikā.
atk-s0508a11:138_5: Ayañca nayo ‘‘mayhaṁ na saṁkilesadhammānaṁ saṁvaraṇamattena siddho, atha kho aggamaggasamādhinā
atk-s0508a11:138_6: suṭṭhu samāhitacittatāya ceva aggamaggapaññāya sabbasaṁyojanehi vippamuttacittatāya
atk-s0508a11:138_7: cā’’ti dassento āha ‘‘cittaṁ me susamāhitaṁ vimutta’’nti. Evaṁbhūto ca ‘‘idānāhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:138_8: katakaraṇīyo’’ti na appossukko homi, atha kho ātāpī viharāmi, sadevakassa lokassa
atk-s0508a11:138_9: hitasukhūpasaṁhāre ussāhajāto bhikkhācārakālepi anugharaṁ brahmavihāreneva viharāmi.
atk-s0508a11:138_10: Tasmā tvampi, deva, pajjunna mayhaṁ piyaṁ kātukāmatāyapi vassūpajīvīnaṁ sattānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:138_11: anukampāyapi vassa sammā dhāraṁ anuppavecchāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0508a11:139_0: Ettha ca thero ‘‘channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā’’ti iminā lokiyalokuttarabhedaṁ attano
atk-s0508a11:139_1: adhisīlasikkhaṁ dasseti. ‘‘Cittaṁ me susamāhita’’nti iminā adhicittasikkhaṁ. ‘‘Vimutta’’nti
atk-s0508a11:139_2: iminā adhipaññāsikkhaṁ. ‘‘Ātāpī viharāmī’’ti iminā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ. Atha
atk-s0508a11:139_3: vā ‘‘channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā’’ti iminā animittavihāraṁ dasseti kilesavassapidhānamukhena
atk-s0508a11:139_5: ‘‘Vimutta’’nti iminā suññatavihāraṁ. ‘‘Ātāpī viharāmī’’ti iminā tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vihārānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:139_6: adhigamūpāyaṁ. Paṭhamena vā dosappahānaṁ, dutiyena rāgappahānaṁ, tatiyena mohappahānaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:139_7: Tathā dutiyena paṭhamadutiyehi vā dhammavihārasampattiyo dasseti. Tatiyena vimuttisampattiyo.
atk-s0508a11:139_8: ‘‘Ātāpī viharāmī’’ti iminā parahitapaṭipattiyaṁ atanditabhāvaṁ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:140_0: Evaṁ ‘‘yathānāmā’’ti gāthāya vuttānaṁ dhammavihārādīnaṁ imāya gāthāya dassitattā
atk-s0508a11:140_1: tattha adassitesu nāmagottesu nāmaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘itthaṁ suda’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Ye hi
atk-s0508a11:140_2: therā nāmamattena pākaṭā, te nāmena, ye gottamattena pākaṭā, te gottena, ye ubhayathā
atk-s0508a11:140_3: pākaṭā, te ubhayenapi dassissa’’nti. Ayaṁ pana thero nāmena abhilakkhito, na tathā
atk-s0508a11:140_4: gottenāti ‘‘itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā subhūtī’’ti vuttaṁ. Tattha itthanti idaṁ pakāraṁ,
atk-s0508a11:140_5: iminā ākārenāti attho. Sudanti su idaṁ, sandhivasena ikāralopo. Sūti ca nipātamattaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:140_6: idaṁ gāthanti yojanā. Āyasmāti piyavacanametaṁ garugāravasappatissavacanametaṁ. Subhūtīti
atk-s0508a11:140_7: nāmakittanaṁ. So hi sarīrasampattiyāpi dassanīyo pāsādiko, guṇasampattiyāpi. Iti
atk-s0508a11:140_8: sundarāya sarīrāvayavavibhūtiyā sīlasampattiyādivibhūtiyā ca samannāgatattā subhūtīti
atk-s0508a11:140_9: paññāyittha sīlasārādithiraguṇayogato thero. Abhāsitthāti kathesi. Kasmā panete mahātherā
atk-s0508a11:140_10: attano guṇe pakāsentīti? Iminā dīghena addhunā anadhigatapubbaṁ paramagambhīraṁ ativiya
atk-s0508a11:140_11: santaṁ paṇītaṁ attanā adhigataṁ lokuttaradhammaṁ paccavekkhitvā pītivegasamussāhitaudānavasena
atk-s0508a11:140_12: sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanavasena ca paramappicchā ariyā attano guṇe pakāsenti,
atk-s0508a11:140_13: yathā taṁ lokanātho bodhaneyyaajjhāsayavasena ‘‘dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave, tathāgato
atk-s0508a11:140_14: catuvesārajjavisārado’’tiādinā attano guṇe pakāseti, evamayaṁ therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā hotīti.
atk-s0508a11:144_0: Upasantoti āyasmato mahākoṭṭhikattherassa gāthā. Tassa kā uppatti? Ayampi thero padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a11:144_1: bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto mātāpitūnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:144_2: accayena kuṭumbaṁ saṇṭhapetvā gharāvāsaṁ vasanto ekadivasaṁ padumuttarassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:144_3: dhammadesanākāle haṁsavatīnagaravāsike gandhamālādihatthe yena buddho yena dhammo
atk-s0508a11:144_4: yena saṅgho, tanninne tappoṇe tappabbhāre gacchante disvā mahājanena saddhiṁ upagato
atk-s0508a11:144_5: satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā ‘‘ayaṁ kira
atk-s0508a11:144_6: imasmiṁ sāsane paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggo, aho vatāhampi ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṁ
atk-s0508a11:144_7: viya paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggo bhaveyya’’nti cintetvā satthu desanāpariyosāne vuṭṭhitāya
atk-s0508a11:144_8: parisāya bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā, ‘‘bhante, sve mayhaṁ bhikkhaṁ gaṇhathā’’ti nimantesi.
atk-s0508a11:144_9: Satthā adhivāsesi. So bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā sakanivesanaṁ gantvā
atk-s0508a11:144_10: sabbarattiṁ buddhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa ca nisajjaṭṭhānaṁ gandhadāmamālādāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0508a11:144_11: paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā tassā rattiyā accayena sake nivesane
atk-s0508a11:144_13: gandhasālibhojanaṁ bhojetvā bhattakiccapariyosāne cintesi – ‘‘mahantaṁ, kho, ahaṁ
atk-s0508a11:144_14: ṭhānantaraṁ patthemi na kho pana mayhaṁ yuttaṁ ekadivasameva dānaṁ datvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ
atk-s0508a11:144_15: patthetuṁ, anupaṭipāṭiyā satta divase dānaṁ datvā patthessāmī’’ti . So teneva niyāmena
atk-s0508a11:144_16: satta divase mahādānāni datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne dussakoṭṭhāgāraṁ vivarāpetvā
atk-s0508a11:144_17: uttamaṁ ticīvarappahonakaṁ sukhumavatthaṁ buddhassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā bhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0508a11:144_18: ca ticīvaraṁ datvā tathāgataṁ upasaṅkamitvā, ‘‘bhante, yo so bhikkhu tumhehi ito
atk-s0508a11:144_19: sattamadivasamatthake etadagge ṭhapito, ahampi so bhikkhu viya anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa
atk-s0508a11:144_20: sāsane pabbajitvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggo bhaveyya’’nti vatvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā
atk-s0508a11:144_21: patthanaṁ akāsi. Satthā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṁ disvā ‘‘anāgate ito kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0508a11:144_22: gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tava patthanā samijjhissatī’’ti
atk-s0508a11:156: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:160: Atthe dhamme nirutte ca, paṭibhāne ca kovidaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:164: Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṁ ṭhānaṁ patthayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:172: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:174: Koṭṭhiko nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a11:175: ‘‘Taṁ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṁ tadā jinaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:182: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṁ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
atk-s0508a11:184: Aññaṁ gatiṁ na gacchāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:186: Nīce kule na jāyāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:190: Yadā me pitaraṁ buddho, vinayī sabbasuddhiyā.
atk-s0508a11:196: Pabhinnā tena lokaggo, etadagge ṭhapesi maṁ.
atk-s0508a11:201: ‘‘Svāgataṁ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a11:202: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:205_0: Evaṁ so tattha tattha bhave puññañāṇasambhāraṁ sambharanto aparāparaṁ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:205_1: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Koṭṭhikotissa
atk-s0508a11:205_2: nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṁ gato ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a11:205_3: satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampannakālato
atk-s0508a11:205_4: paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ patvā paṭisambhidāsu
atk-s0508a11:205_5: ciṇṇavasī hutvā abhiññāte abhiññāte mahāthere upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchantopi dasabalaṁ
atk-s0508a11:205_6: upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchantopi paṭisambhidāsuyeva pañhaṁ pucchi. Evamayaṁ thero
atk-s0508a11:205_7: tattha katādhikāratāya ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ aggo jāto. Atha naṁ
atk-s0508a11:205_8: satthā mahāvedallasuttaṁ (ma. ni. 1.449 ādayo) aṭṭhuppattiṁ katvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:205_9: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi – ‘‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭisambhidāpattānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:205_10: yadidaṁ mahākoṭṭhiko’’ti (a. ni. 1.209, 218). So aparena samayena vimuttisukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedento udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:209: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā mahākoṭṭhikatthero gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:210_0: Tattha upasantoti manacchaṭṭhānaṁ indriyānaṁ upasamanena nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena
atk-s0508a11:210_1: upasanto. Uparatoti sabbasmā pāpakaraṇato orato virato. Mantabhāṇīti mantā vuccati
atk-s0508a11:210_2: paññā, tāya pana upaparikkhitvā bhaṇatīti mantabhāṇī, kālavādīādibhāvaṁ avissajjentoyeva
atk-s0508a11:210_3: bhaṇatīti attho. Mantabhaṇanavasena vā bhaṇatīti mantabhāṇī, dubbhāsitato vinā attano
atk-s0508a11:210_4: bhāsanavasena caturaṅgasamannāgataṁ subhāsitaṁyeva bhaṇatīti attho. Jātiādivasena
atk-s0508a11:210_5: attano anukkaṁsanato na uddhatoti anuddhato atha vā tiṇṇaṁ kāyaduccaritānaṁ vūpasamanena
atk-s0508a11:210_6: tato paṭiviratiyā upasanto, tiṇṇaṁ manoduccaritānaṁ uparamaṇena pajahanena uparato,
atk-s0508a11:210_7: catunnaṁ vacīduccaritānaṁ appavattiyā parimitabhāṇitāya mantabhāṇī, tividhaduccaritanimittauppajjanakassa
atk-s0508a11:210_8: uddhaccassa abhāvato anuddhato. Evaṁ pana tividhaduccaritappahānena suddhe sīle patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0508a11:210_9: uddhaccappahānena samāhito, tameva samādhiṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ katvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a11:210_10: maggapaṭipāṭiyā dhunāti pāpake dhamme lāmakaṭṭhena pāpake sabbepi saṁkilesadhamme
atk-s0508a11:210_11: niddhunāti, samucchedavasena pajahati . Yathā kiṁ? Dumapattaṁva māluto, yathā nāma
atk-s0508a11:210_12: dumassa rukkhassa pattaṁ paṇḍupalāsaṁ māluto vāto dhunāti, bandhanato viyojento nīharati,
atk-s0508a11:210_13: evaṁ yathāvuttapaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhito pāpadhamme attano santānato nīharati, evamayaṁ
atk-s0508a11:211_0: Ettha ca kāyavacīduccaritappahānavacanena payogasuddhiṁ dasseti, manoduccaritappahānavacanena
atk-s0508a11:211_2: tadekaṭṭhatāya nīvaraṇappahānaṁ dasseti. Tesu payogasuddhiyā sīlasampatti vibhāvitā,
atk-s0508a11:211_4: ‘‘dhunāti pāpake dhamme’’ti iminā paññābhāvanā vibhāvitā hoti. Evaṁ adhisīlasikkhādayo
atk-s0508a11:211_5: tisso sikkhā, tividhakalyāṇaṁ sāsanaṁ, tadaṅgappahānādīni tīṇi pahānāni, antadvayaparivajjanena
atk-s0508a11:211_6: saddhiṁ majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṁ, apāyabhavādīnaṁ samatikkamanūpāyo ca
atk-s0508a11:211_7: yathārahaṁ niddhāretvā yojetabbā. Iminā nayena sesagāthāsupi yathārahaṁ atthayojanā
atk-s0508a11:211_8: veditabbā. Atthamattameva pana tattha tattha apubbaṁ vaṇṇayissāma. ‘‘Itthaṁ sudaṁ
atk-s0508a11:211_9: āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko’’ti idaṁ pūjāvacanaṁ, yathā taṁ mahāmoggallānoti.
atk-s0508a11:214_0: Paññaṁ imaṁ passāti āyasmato kaṅkhārevatassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi thero padumuttarabhagavato
atk-s0508a11:214_1: kāle haṁsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto. Ekadivasaṁ buddhānaṁ dhammadesanākāle
atk-s0508a11:214_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahājanena saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:214_3: suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ jhānābhiratānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā ‘‘mayāpi
atk-s0508a11:214_4: anāgate evarūpena bhavituṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti cintetvā desanāvasāne satthāraṁ nimantetvā
atk-s0508a11:214_5: heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahāsakkāraṁ katvā bhagavantaṁ āha – ‘‘bhante, ahaṁ iminā adhikārakammena
atk-s0508a11:214_6: aññaṁ sampattiṁ na patthemi, yathā pana so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattamadivasamatthake
atk-s0508a11:214_7: jhāyīnaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, evaṁ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane jhāyīnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:214_8: aggo bhaveyya’’nti patthanamakāsi. Satthā anāgataṁ oloketvā nipphajjanabhāvaṁ disvā
atk-s0508a11:214_9: ‘‘anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:215_0: So yāvajīvaṁ kalyāṇakammaṁ katvā kappasatasahassaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaritvā amhākaṁ
atk-s0508a11:215_1: bhagavato kāle sāvatthinagare mahābhogakule nibbatto pacchābhattaṁ dhammassavanatthaṁ
atk-s0508a11:215_2: gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dasabalassa dhammakathaṁ
atk-s0508a11:215_3: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadaṁ labhitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ kathāpetvā jhānaparikammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:215_4: karonto jhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. So yebhuyyena dasabalena
atk-s0508a11:215_5: samāpajjitabbasamāpattiṁ samāpajjanto ahorattaṁ jhānesu ciṇṇavasī ahosi. Atha naṁ
atk-s0508a11:215_6: satthā ‘‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ yadidaṁ kaṅkhārevato’’ti
atk-s0508a11:215_7: (a. ni. 1.198, 204) jhāyīnaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Vuttampi cetaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.55.34-53) –
atk-s0508a11:229: Mudito hohi tvaṁ brahme, lacchase taṁ manorathaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:231: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:233: Revato nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a11:236: ‘‘Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātohaṁ koliye pure;
atk-s0508a11:240: ‘‘Kaṅkhā me bahulā āsi, kappākappe tahiṁ tahiṁ;
atk-s0508a11:241: Sabbaṁ taṁ vinayī buddho, desetvā dhammamuttamaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:243: Viharāmi tadā buddho, maṁ disvā etadabravi.
atk-s0508a11:244: ‘‘Yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṁ vā, savediyā vā paravediyā vā;
atk-s0508a11:245: Ye jhāyino tā pajahanti sabbā, ātāpino brahmacariyaṁ carantā.
atk-s0508a11:246: ‘‘Satasahasse kataṁ kammaṁ, phalaṁ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a11:252: ‘‘Svāgataṁ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a11:253: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:256_0: Tathā katakicco panāyaṁ mahāthero pubbe dīgharattaṁ attano kaṅkhāpakatacittataṁ idāni
atk-s0508a11:256_1: sabbaso vigatakaṅkhatañca paccavekkhitvā ‘‘aho nūna mayhaṁ satthuno desanānubhāvo,
atk-s0508a11:256_2: tenetarahi evaṁ vigatakaṅkho ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto jāto’’ti sañjātabahumāno bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:256_3: paññaṁ pasaṁsanto ‘‘paññaṁ imaṁ passā’’ti imaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a11:257_0: 3. Tattha paññanti pakāre jānāti, pakārehi ñāpetīti ca paññā. Veneyyānaṁ āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādippakāre
atk-s0508a11:257_1: dhammānaṁ kusalādike khandhādike ca desetabbappakāre jānāti, yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0508a11:257_2: tehi ca pakārehi ñāpetīti attho. Satthu desanāñāṇañhi idhādhippetaṁ, tenāha ‘‘ima’’nti.
atk-s0508a11:257_3: Tañhi attani siddhena desanābalena nayaggāhato paccakkhaṁ viya upaṭṭhitaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0508a11:257_4: ‘‘ima’’nti vuttaṁ. Yadaggena vā satthu desanāñāṇaṁ sāvakehi nayato gayhati, tadaggena
atk-s0508a11:257_5: attano visaye paṭivedhañāṇampi nayato gayhateva. Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati – ‘‘apica
atk-s0508a11:257_6: me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito’’ti (dī. ni. 2.146; 3.143). Passāti vimhayappatto
atk-s0508a11:257_7: aniyamato ālapati attanoyeva vā cittaṁ, yathāha bhagavā udānento – ‘‘lokamimaṁ passa;
atk-s0508a11:257_8: puthū avijjāya paretaṁ bhūtaṁ bhūtarataṁ bhavā aparimutta’’nti (udā. 30). Tathāgatānanti
atk-s0508a11:257_9: tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgatānaṁ. Tathā āgatoti hi tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato,
atk-s0508a11:257_10: tathalakkhaṇaṁ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato,
atk-s0508a11:257_11: tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato, abhibhavanaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a11:257_12: tathāgatoti evaṁ aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato. Tathāya āgatoti tathāgato, tathāya
atk-s0508a11:257_13: gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṁ gatoti tathāgato, tathāni āgatoti tathāgato, tathāvidhoti
atk-s0508a11:257_14: tathāgato, tathā pavattitoti tathāgato, tathehi āgatoti tathāgato , tathā gatabhāvena
atk-s0508a11:257_15: tathāgatoti evampi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgatoti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro
atk-s0508a11:258_0: Idāni tassā paññāya asādhāraṇavisesaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘aggi yathā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Yathā
atk-s0508a11:258_1: aggīti upamāvacanaṁ. Yathāti tassa upamābhāvadassanaṁ. Pajjalitoti upameyyena sambandhadassanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:258_2: Nisītheti kiccakaraṇakāladassanaṁ. Ayañhettha attho – yathā nāma nisīthe rattiyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:258_3: caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre vattamāne unnate ṭhāne pajjalito aggi tasmiṁ padese
atk-s0508a11:258_4: tayagataṁ vidhamantaṁ tiṭṭhati, evameva tathāgatānaṁ imaṁ desanāñāṇasaṅkhātaṁ sabbaso
atk-s0508a11:258_5: veneyyānaṁ saṁsayatamaṁ vidhamantaṁ paññaṁ passāti. Yato desanāvilāsena sattānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:258_6: ñāṇamayaṁ ālokaṁ dentīti ālokadā. Paññāmayameva cakkhuṁ dadantīti cakkhudadā. Tadubhayampi
atk-s0508a11:258_7: kaṅkhāvinayapadaṭṭhānameva katvā dassento ‘‘ye āgatānaṁ vinayanti kaṅkha’’nti āha,
atk-s0508a11:258_8: ye tathāgatā attano santikaṁ āgatānaṁ upagatānaṁ veneyyānaṁ ‘‘ahosiṁ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna’’ntiādinayappavattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:258_9: (ma. ni. 1.18; saṁ. ni. 2.20) soḷasavatthukaṁ, ‘‘buddhe kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatī’’tiādinayappavattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:258_10: (dha. sa. 1008) aṭṭhavatthukañca kaṅkhaṁ vicikicchaṁ vinayanti desanānubhāvena anavasesato
atk-s0508a11:258_11: vidhamanti viddhaṁsenti. Vinayakukkuccasaṅkhātā pana kaṅkhā tabbinayeneva vinītā hontīti.
atk-s0508a11:259_0: Aparo nayo – yathā aggi nisīthe rattibhāge pajjalito paṭutarajālo samujjalaṁ uccāsane
atk-s0508a11:259_1: ṭhitānaṁ obhāsadānamattena andhakāraṁ vidhamitvā samavisamaṁ vibhāvento ālokadado
atk-s0508a11:259_2: hoti. Accāsanne pana ṭhitānaṁ taṁ supākaṭaṁ karonto cakkhukiccakaraṇato cakkhudado
atk-s0508a11:259_3: nāma hoti, evameva tathāgato attano dhammakāyassa dūre ṭhitānaṁ akatādhikārānaṁ paññāpajjotena
atk-s0508a11:259_4: mohandhakāraṁ vidhamitvā kāyavisamādisamavisamaṁ vibhāvento ālokadā bhavanti, āsanne
atk-s0508a11:259_5: ṭhitānaṁ pana katādhikārānaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ uppādento cakkhudadā bhavanti. Ye evaṁbhūtā
atk-s0508a11:259_6: attano vacīgocaraṁ āgatānaṁ mādisānampi kaṅkhābahulānaṁ kaṅkhaṁ vinayanti ariyamaggasamuppādanena
atk-s0508a11:259_7: vidhamanti, tesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ paññaṁ ñāṇātisayaṁ passāti yojanā. Evamayaṁ therassa
atk-s0508a11:259_8: attano kaṅkhāvitaraṇappakāsanena aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi hoti. Ayañhi thero puthujjanakāle
atk-s0508a11:259_9: kappiyepi kukkuccako hutvā kaṅkhābahulatāya ‘‘kaṅkhārevato’’ti paññāto, pacchā khīṇāsavakālepi
atk-s0508a11:259_10: tatheva voharayittha. Tenāha – ‘‘itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā kaṅkhārevato gāthaṁ abhāsitthā’’ti. Taṁ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a11:262_0: Sabbhirevasamāsethāti āyasmato puṇṇattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a11:262_1: dasabalassa uppattito puretarameva haṁsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto
atk-s0508a11:262_2: anukkamena viññutaṁ patto satthari loke uppajjante ekadivasaṁ buddhānaṁ dhammadesanākāle
atk-s0508a11:262_3: heṭṭhā vuttanayena mahājanena saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante nisīditvā dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:262_4: suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ dhammakathikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā ‘‘mayāpi
atk-s0508a11:262_5: anāgate evarūpena bhavituṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti cintetvā desanāvasāne vuṭṭhitāya parisāya
atk-s0508a11:262_6: satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā nimantetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva mahāsakkāraṁ katvā bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:262_7: evamāha – ‘‘bhante, ahaṁ iminā adhikārakammena nāññaṁ sampattiṁ patthemi. Yathā pana
atk-s0508a11:262_8: so bhikkhu ito sattamadivasamatthake dhammakathikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, evaṁ ahampi
atk-s0508a11:262_9: anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ aggo bhaveyya’’nti patthanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:262_10: akāsi. Satthā anāgataṁ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṁ disvā ‘‘anāgate
atk-s0508a11:262_11: kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tvaṁ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:263_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṁ kalyāṇadhammaṁ katvā tato cuto kappasatasahassaṁ puññañāṇasambhāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:263_1: sambharanto devamanussesu saṁsaritvā amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthunagarassa
atk-s0508a11:263_3: bhāgineyyo hutvā nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase ‘‘puṇṇo’’ti nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So satthari
atk-s0508a11:263_4: abhisambodhiṁ patvā pavattavaradhammacakke anupubbena rājagahaṁ gantvā taṁ upanissāya
atk-s0508a11:263_5: viharante aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado sabbaṁ pubbakiccaṁ
atk-s0508a11:263_6: katvā padhānamanuyuñjanto pabbajitakiccaṁ matthakaṁ pāpetvāva ‘‘dasabalassa santikaṁ
atk-s0508a11:263_7: gamissāmī’’ti mātulattherena saddhiṁ satthu santikaṁ agantvā kapilavatthusāmantāyeva
atk-s0508a11:263_8: ohīyitvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:271: Sabbe sissā attamanā, sutvāna mama bhāsato.
atk-s0508a11:279_0: Tassa pana puṇṇattherassa santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṁ. Thero sayaṁ
atk-s0508a11:279_1: dasakathāvatthulābhitāya tepi dasahi kathāvatthūhi ovadi. Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbeva
atk-s0508a11:279_2: arahattaṁ pattā. Te attano pabbajitakiccaṁ matthakappattaṁ ñatvā upajjhāyaṁ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a11:279_3: āhaṁsu – ‘‘bhante, amhākaṁ kiccaṁ matthakappattaṁ, dasannañcamha kathāvatthūnaṁ lābhino,
atk-s0508a11:279_4: samayo, dāni no dasabalaṁ passitu’’nti. Thero tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā cintesi – ‘‘mama
atk-s0508a11:279_5: dasakathāvatthulābhitaṁ satthā jānāti ahaṁ dhammaṁ desento dasa kathāvatthūni amuñcitvāva
atk-s0508a11:279_6: desemi, mayi gacchante sabbepime bhikkhū maṁ parivāretvā gacchissanti, evaṁ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya
atk-s0508a11:279_7: gantvā pana ayuttaṁ mayhaṁ dasabalaṁ passituṁ, ime tāva gantvā passantū’’ti te bhikkhū
atk-s0508a11:279_8: āha – ‘‘āvuso, tumhe purato gantvā tathāgataṁ passatha, mama vacanena cassa pāde
atk-s0508a11:279_9: vandatha, ahampi tumhākaṁ gatamaggenāgamissāmī’’ti. Te therā sabbepi dasabalassa
atk-s0508a11:279_10: jātibhūmiraṭṭhavāsino sabbe khīṇāsavā sabbe dasakathāvatthulābhino attano upajjhāyassa
atk-s0508a11:279_11: ovādaṁ sampaṭicchitvā theraṁ vanditvā anupubbena cārikaṁ carantā saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṁ
atk-s0508a11:279_12: atikkamma rājagahe veḷuvanamahāvihāraṁ gantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:280_0: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammoditunti
atk-s0508a11:280_1: bhagavā tehi saddhiṁ – ‘‘kacci, bhikkhave, khamanīya’’ntiādinā nayena madhurapaṭisanthāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:280_2: katvā ‘‘kuto ca tumhe, bhikkhave, āgacchathā’’ti pucchi . Atha tehi ‘‘jātibhūmito’’ti
atk-s0508a11:280_3: vutte ‘‘ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jātibhūmiyaṁ jātibhūmakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:280_4: evaṁ sambhāvito ‘attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṁ kattā’’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-s0508a11:280_5: 1.252) dasakathāvatthulābhiṁ bhikkhuṁ pucchi. Tepi ‘‘puṇṇo nāma, bhante, āyasmā mantāṇiputto’’ti
atk-s0508a11:280_6: ārocayiṁsu. Taṁ kathaṁ sutvā āyasmā sāriputto therassa dassanakāmo ahosi. Atha satthā
atk-s0508a11:280_7: rājagahato sāvatthiṁ agamāsi . Puṇṇattheropi dasabalassa tattha āgatabhāvaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a11:280_8: – ‘‘satthāraṁ passissāmī’’ti gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṁyeva tathāgataṁ sampāpuṇi. Satthā
atk-s0508a11:280_9: tassa dhammaṁ desesi. Thero dhammaṁ sutvā dasabalaṁ vanditvā paṭisallānatthāya andhavanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:281_0: Sāriputtattheropi tassāgamanaṁ sutvā sīsānulokiko gantvā okāsaṁ sallakkhetvā taṁ
atk-s0508a11:281_1: rukkhamūle nisinnaṁ upasaṅkamitvā therena saddhiṁ sammoditvā, taṁ sattavisuddhikkamaṁ
atk-s0508a11:281_2: pucchi. Theropissa pucchitapucchitaṁ byākaronto rathavinītūpamāya cittaṁ ārādhesi,
atk-s0508a11:281_3: te aññamaññassa subhāsitaṁ samanumodiṁsu. Atha satthā aparabhāge bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0508a11:281_4: nisinno theraṁ ‘‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammakathikānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:281_5: yadidaṁ puṇṇo’’ti (a. ni. 1.188, 196) dhammakathikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a11:281_6: attano vimuttisampattiṁ paccavekkhitvā ‘‘satthāraṁ nissāya ahañceva aññe ca bahū
atk-s0508a11:281_7: sattā saṁsāradukkhato vippamuttā, bahūpakārā vata sappurisasaṁsevā’’ti pītisomanassajāto
atk-s0508a11:282_0: 4. Tattha sabbhirevāti sappurisehi eva. Santoti panettha buddhādayo ariyā adhippetā.
atk-s0508a11:282_1: Te hi anavasesato asataṁ dhammaṁ pahāya saddhamme ukkaṁsagatattā sātisayaṁ pasaṁsiyattā
atk-s0508a11:282_2: ca visesato ‘‘santo sappurisā’’ti ca vuccanti. Samāsethāti samaṁ āsetha saha vaseyya.
atk-s0508a11:282_3: Te payirupāsanto tesaṁ sussūsanto diṭṭhānugatiñca āpajjanto samānavāso bhaveyyāti
atk-s0508a11:282_4: attho. Paṇḍitehatthadassibhīti tesaṁ thomanā. Paṇḍā vuccati paññā, sā imesaṁ sañjātāti
atk-s0508a11:282_5: paṇḍitā. Tato eva attatthādibhedaṁ atthaṁ aviparītato passantīti atthadassino. Tehi
atk-s0508a11:282_6: paṇḍitehi atthadassībhi samāsetha. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā te santo paṇḍitā, te vā sammā
atk-s0508a11:282_7: sevantā ekantahitabhāvato maggañāṇādīheva araṇīyato atthaṁ, mahāguṇatāya santatāya
atk-s0508a11:282_8: ca mahantaṁ, agādhabhāvato gambhīrañāṇagocarato ca gambhīraṁ, hīnacchandādīhi daṭṭhuṁ
atk-s0508a11:282_9: asakkuṇeyyattā itarehi ca kicchena daṭṭhabbattā duddasaṁ, duddasattā saṇhanipuṇasabhāvattā
atk-s0508a11:282_10: nipuṇañāṇagocarato ca nipuṇaṁ, nipuṇattā evaṁ sukhumasabhāvatāya aṇuṁ nibbānaṁ, aviparītaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a11:282_11: vā paramatthasabhāvattā atthaṁ, ariyabhāvakarattā mahattanimittatāya mahantaṁ, anuttānasabhāvatāya
atk-s0508a11:282_12: gambhīraṁ, dukkhena daṭṭhabbaṁ na sukhena daṭṭhuṁ sakkāti duddasaṁ, gambhīrattā duddasaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:282_13: duddasattā gambhīranti catusaccaṁ, visesato nipuṇaṁ aṇuṁ, nirodhasaccanti evametaṁ
atk-s0508a11:282_14: catusaccaṁ dhīrā samadhigacchanti dhitisampannatāya dhīrā catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:282_15: ussukkāpetvā sammadeva adhigacchanti. Appamattāti sabbattha satiavippavāsena appamādapaṭipattiṁ
atk-s0508a11:282_16: pūrentā. Vicakkhaṇāti vipassanābhāvanāya chekā kusalā. Tasmā sabbhireva samāsethāti
atk-s0508a11:282_17: yojanā. Paṇḍitehatthadassibhīti vā etaṁ nissakkavacanaṁ. Yasmā paṇḍitehi atthadassībhi
atk-s0508a11:282_18: samudāyabhūtehi dhīrā appamattā vicakkhaṇā mahantādivisesavantaṁ atthaṁ samadhigacchanti,
atk-s0508a11:282_19: tasmā tādisehi sabbhireva samāsethāti sambandho. Evamesā therassa paṭivedhadīpanena
atk-s0508a11:285_0: Yo duddamiyoti āyasmato dabbattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0508a11:285_1: haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva dhammadesanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:285_2: suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ senāsanapaññāpakānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā adhikārakammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:285_3: katvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetvā satthārā byākato yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:285_4: saṁsaritvā kassapadasabalassa sāsanosakkanakāle pabbaji. Tadā tena saddhiṁ apare
atk-s0508a11:285_5: cha janāti satta bhikkhū ekacittā hutvā aññe sāsane agāravaṁ karonte disvā – ‘‘idha
atk-s0508a11:285_6: kiṁ karoma ekamante samaṇadhammaṁ katvā dukkhassantaṁ karissāmā’’ti nisseṇiṁ bandhitvā
atk-s0508a11:285_7: uccaṁ pabbatasikharaṁ āruhitvā, ‘‘attano cittabalaṁ jānantā nisseṇiṁ nipātentu, jīvite
atk-s0508a11:285_8: sālayā otarantu, mā pacchānutappino ahuvatthā’’ti vatvā sabbe ekacittā hutvā nisseṇiṁ
atk-s0508a11:285_9: pātetvā – ‘‘appamattā hotha, āvuso’’ti aññamaññaṁ ovaditvā cittarucikesu ṭhānesu
atk-s0508a11:286_0: Tatreko thero pañcame divase arahattaṁ patvā, ‘‘mama kiccaṁ nipphannaṁ, ahaṁ imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:286_1: ṭhāne kiṁ karissāmi’’ti iddhiyā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṁ āharitvā, ‘‘āvuso, imaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ
atk-s0508a11:286_2: paribhuñjatha, bhikkhācārakiccaṁ mamāyattaṁ hotu, tumhe attano kammaṁ karothā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:286_3: āha. ‘‘Kiṁ nu kho mayaṁ, āvuso, nisseṇiṁ pātentā evaṁ avocumha – ‘yo paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:286_4: sacchikaroti, so bhikkhaṁ āharatu, tenābhataṁ sesā paribhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karissantī’’’ti.
atk-s0508a11:286_5: ‘‘Natthi, āvuso’’ti. Tumhe attano pubbahetunā labhittha, mayampi sakkontā vaṭṭassantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:286_6: karissāma, gacchatha tumheti. Thero te saññāpetuṁ asakkonto phāsukaṭṭhāne piṇḍapātaṁ
atk-s0508a11:286_7: paribhuñjitvā gato . Aparo thero sattame divase anāgāmiphalaṁ patvā tato cuto suddhāvāsabrahmaloke
atk-s0508a11:286_8: nibbatto. Itare therā tato cutā ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ devamanussesu saṁsaritvā tesu tesu
atk-s0508a11:286_9: kulesu nibbattā. Eko gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilānagare rājagehe nibbatto, eko majjhantikaraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a11:286_10: paribbājikāya kucchimhi nibbatto, eko bāhiyaraṭṭhe kuṭumbiyagehe nibbatto, eko bhikkhunupassaye jāto.
atk-s0508a11:287_0: Ayaṁ pana dabbatthero mallaraṭṭhe anupiyanagare ekassa mallarañño gehe paṭisandhiṁ
atk-s0508a11:287_1: gaṇhi. Tassa mātā upavijaññā kālamakāsi, matasarīraṁ susānaṁ netvā dārucitakaṁ āropetvā
atk-s0508a11:287_2: aggiṁ adaṁsu. Tassā aggivegasantattaṁ udarapaṭalaṁ dvedhā ahosi. Dārako attano puññabalena
atk-s0508a11:287_3: uppatitvā ekasmiṁ dabbatthambhe nipati. Taṁ dārakaṁ gahetvā ayyikāya adaṁsu. Sā tassa
atk-s0508a11:287_4: nāmaṁ gaṇhantī dabbatthambhe patitvā laddhajīvitattā ‘‘dabbo’’tissa nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:287_5: Tassa ca sattavassikakāle satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro mallaraṭṭhe cārikaṁ caramāno
atk-s0508a11:287_6: anupiyambavane viharati. Dabbakumāro satthāraṁ disvā dassaneneva pasīditvā pabbajitukāmo
atk-s0508a11:287_7: hutvā ‘‘ahaṁ dasabalassa santike pabbajissāmī’’ti ayyikaṁ āpucchi. Sā ‘‘sādhu, tātā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:287_8: dabbakumāraṁ ādāya satthu santikaṁ gantvā, ‘‘bhante, imaṁ kumāraṁ pabbājethā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:287_9: āha. Satthā aññatarassa bhikkhuno saññaṁ adāsi – ‘‘bhikkhu imaṁ dārakaṁ pabbājehī’’ti.
atk-s0508a11:287_10: So thero satthu vacanaṁ sutvā dabbakumāraṁ pabbājento tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṁ ācikkhi.
atk-s0508a11:287_11: Pubbahetusampanno katābhinīhāro satto paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā voropanakkhaṇe sotāpattiphale
atk-s0508a11:287_12: patiṭṭhahi, dutiyāya kesavaṭṭiyā oropiyamānāya sakadāgāmiphale, tatiyāya anāgāmiphale,
atk-s0508a11:287_13: sabbakesānaṁ pana oropanañca arahattaphalasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apure ahosi. Satthā
atk-s0508a11:287_14: mallaraṭṭhe yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā rājagahaṁ gantvā veḷuvane vāsaṁ kappesi.
atk-s0508a11:288_0: Tatrāyasmā dabbo mallaputto rahogato attano kiccanipphattiṁ oloketvā saṅghassa veyyāvaccakaraṇe
atk-s0508a11:288_1: kāyaṁ yojetukāmo cintesi – ‘‘yaṁnūnāhaṁ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññāpeyyaṁ bhattāni
atk-s0508a11:288_2: ca uddiseyya’’nti. So satthu santikaṁ gantvā attano parivitakkaṁ ārocesi. Satthā
atk-s0508a11:288_3: tassa sādhukāraṁ datvā senāsanapaññāpakattañca bhattuddesakattañca sampaṭicchi. Atha
atk-s0508a11:288_4: naṁ ‘‘ayaṁ dabbo daharova samāno mahante ṭhāne ṭhito’’ti sattavassikakāleyeva upasampādesi.
atk-s0508a11:288_5: Thero upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya rājagahaṁ upanissāya viharantānaṁ sabbabhikkhūnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:288_6: senāsanāni ca paññāpeti, bhikkhañca uddisati. Tassa senāsanapaññāpakabhāvo sabbadisāsu
atk-s0508a11:288_7: pākaṭo ahosi – ‘‘dabbo kira mallaputto sabhāgasabhāgānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ekaṭṭhāne senāsanāni
atk-s0508a11:288_8: paññāpeti, āsannepi dūrepi senāsanaṁ paññāpeti, gantuṁ asakkonte iddhiyā netī’’ti.
atk-s0508a11:289_0: Atha naṁ bhikkhū kālepi vikālepi – ‘‘amhākaṁ, āvuso, jīvakambavane senāsanaṁ paññāpehi,
atk-s0508a11:289_1: amhākaṁ maddakucchismiṁ migadāye’’ti evaṁ senāsanaṁ uddisāpetvā tassa iddhiṁ passantā
atk-s0508a11:289_2: gacchanti. Sopi iddhiyā manomaye kāye abhisaṅkharitvā ekekassa therassa ekekaṁ attanā
atk-s0508a11:289_3: sadisaṁ bhikkhuṁ datvā aṅguliyā jalamānāya purato gantvā ‘‘ayaṁ mañco idaṁ pīṭha’’ntiādīni
atk-s0508a11:289_4: vatvā senāsanaṁ paññāpetvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva āgacchati . Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0508a11:289_5: vitthārato panidaṁ vatthu pāḷiyaṁ āgatameva. Satthā idameva kāraṇaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ
atk-s0508a11:289_6: katvā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṁ senāsanapaññāpakānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi
atk-s0508a11:289_7: – ‘‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ senāsanapaññāpakānaṁ yadidaṁ
atk-s0508a11:289_8: dabbo mallaputto’’ti (a. ni. 1.209; 214). Vuttampi cetaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.54, 108-149) –
atk-s0508a11:301: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:313: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:321: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṁ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
atk-s0508a11:329: Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṁ varo.
atk-s0508a11:335: Na suṇissāma saddhammaṁ, aho no appapuññatā.
atk-s0508a11:337: Sāgaro ca sasokova, vinadī karuṇaṁ giraṁ.
atk-s0508a11:341: Sadhūmā jālavaṭṭā ca, raviṁsu karuṇaṁ migā.
atk-s0508a11:343: Saṁviggā bhikkhavo satta, cintayimha mayaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a11:351: Tasmā payogo kattabbo, yāva ṭhāti mune mataṁ.
atk-s0508a11:355: Ahañca pakkusāti ca, sabhiyo bāhiyo tathā.
atk-s0508a11:359: Mātā matā citāruḷhā, tato nippatito ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:367: Jino tasmiṁ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṁ.
atk-s0508a11:371: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:373_0: Evaṁbhūtaṁ pana taṁ yena pubbe ekassa khīṇāsavattherassa anuddhaṁsanavasena katena
atk-s0508a11:373_1: pāpakammena bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye pacci, tāya eva kammapilotikāya codiyamānā
atk-s0508a11:373_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū ‘‘iminā mayaṁ kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino antare paribheditā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:373_3: duggahitagāhino amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsesuṁ. Tasmiñca adhikaraṇe
atk-s0508a11:373_4: saṅghena sativinayena vūpasamite ayaṁ thero lokānukampāya attano guṇe vibhāvento
atk-s0508a11:374_0: 5. Tattha yoti aniyamitaniddeso, tassa ‘‘so’’ti iminā niyamattaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ubhayenapi
atk-s0508a11:374_1: aññaṁ viya katvā attānameva vadati. Duddamiyoti duddamo, dametuṁ asakkuṇeyyo. Idañca
atk-s0508a11:374_2: attano puthujjanakāle diṭṭhigatānaṁ visūkāyikānaṁ kilesānaṁ madālepacittassa vipphanditaṁ
atk-s0508a11:374_3: indriyānaṁ avūpasamanañca cintetvā vadati. Damenāti uttamena aggamaggadamena, tena
atk-s0508a11:374_4: hi danto puna dametabbatābhāvato ‘‘danto’’ti vattabbataṁ arahati, na aññena. Atha
atk-s0508a11:374_5: vā damenāti damakena purisadammasārathinā damito . Dabboti drabyo, bhabboti attho.
atk-s0508a11:374_6: Tenāha bhagavā imameva theraṁ sandhāya – ‘‘na kho, dabba, dabbā evaṁ nibbeṭhentī’’ti
atk-s0508a11:374_8: maggaphalasantosena ca santuṭṭho. Vitiṇṇakaṅkhoti soḷasavatthukāya aṭṭhavatthukāya
atk-s0508a11:374_9: ca kaṅkhāya paṭhamamaggeneva samugghāṭitattā vigatakaṅkho. Vijitāvīti purisājānīyena
atk-s0508a11:374_10: vijetabbassa sabbassapi saṁkilesapakkhassa vijitattā vidhamitattā vijitāvī. Apetabheravoti
atk-s0508a11:374_11: pañcavīsatiyā bhayānaṁ sabbaso apetattā apagatabheravo abhayūparato . Puna dabboti
atk-s0508a11:374_12: nāmakittanaṁ. Parinibbutoti dve parinibbānāni kilesaparinibbānañca, yā saupādisesanibbānadhātu,
atk-s0508a11:374_13: khandhaparinibbānañca, yā anupādisesanibbānadhātu. Tesu idha kilesaparinibbānaṁ adhippetaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:374_14: tasmā pahātabbadhammānaṁ maggena sabbaso pahīnattā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbutoti
atk-s0508a11:374_15: attho. Ṭhitattoti ṭhitasabhāvo acalo iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā lokadhammehi akampanīyo.
atk-s0508a11:374_16: Hīti ca hetuatthe nipāto, tena yo pubbe duddamo hutvā ṭhito yasmā dabbattā satthārā
atk-s0508a11:374_17: uttamena damena damito santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho vijitāvī apetabheravo, tasmā so dabbo
atk-s0508a11:374_18: parinibbuto tatoyeva ca ṭhitatto, evaṁbhūte ca tasmiṁ cittapasādova kātabbo, na pasādaññathattanti
atk-s0508a11:374_19: paraneyyabuddhike satte anukampanto thero aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:377_0: Yo sītavananti āyasmato sambhūtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ito kira aṭṭhārasādhikassa
atk-s0508a11:377_1: kappasatassa matthake atthadassī nāma sambuddho loke uppajjitvā sadevakaṁ lokaṁ saṁsāramahoghato
atk-s0508a11:377_2: tārento ekadivasaṁ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ gaṅgātīraṁ upagacchi. Tasmiṁ kāle
atk-s0508a11:377_3: ayaṁ gahapatikule nibbatto tattha bhagavantaṁ passitvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a11:377_4: vanditvā ‘‘kiṁ, bhante, pāraṁ gantukāmatthā’’ti pucchi. Bhagavā ‘‘gamissāmā’’ti avoca.
atk-s0508a11:377_5: So tāvadeva nāvāsaṅghāṭaṁ yojetvā upanesi. Satthā taṁ anukampanto saha bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0508a11:377_6: nāvaṁ abhiruhi. So sayampi abhiruyha sukheneva paratīraṁ sampāpetvā bhagavantaṁ bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0508a11:377_7: dutiyadivase mahādānaṁ pavattetvā anugantvā pasannacitto vanditvā nivatti. So tena
atk-s0508a11:377_8: puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaritvā ito terasādhikakappasatassa matthake khattiyakule
atk-s0508a11:377_9: nibbattitvā rājā ahosi cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā. So satte sugatimagge patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0508a11:377_10: tato cuto ekanavutikappe vipassissa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā dhutadhamme samādāya
atk-s0508a11:377_11: susāne vasanto samaṇadhammaṁ akāsi. Puna kassapassa bhagavato kālepi tassa sāsane
atk-s0508a11:377_12: tīhi sahāyehi saddhiṁ pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṁ katvā ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ
atk-s0508a11:377_13: devamanussesu saṁsaritvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā
atk-s0508a11:377_14: nibbatti. Tassa ‘‘sambhūto’’ti nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṁ
atk-s0508a11:377_15: gato. Bhūmijo jeyyaseno abhirādhanoti tīhi sahāyehi saddhiṁ bhagavato santikaṁ gato
atk-s0508a11:377_16: dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. Ye sandhāya vuttaṁ –
atk-s0508a11:380_0: Atha sambhūto bhagavato santike kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā nibaddhaṁ sītavane
atk-s0508a11:380_1: vasati. Tenevāyasmā ‘‘sītavaniyo’’ti paññāyittha. Tena ca samayena vessavaṇo mahārājā
atk-s0508a11:380_2: kenacideva karaṇīyena jambudīpe dakkhiṇadisābhāgaṁ uddissa ākāsena gacchanto theraṁ
atk-s0508a11:380_3: abbhokāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontaṁ disvā vimānato oruyha theraṁ vanditvā,
atk-s0508a11:380_4: ‘‘yadā thero samādhito vuṭṭhahissati, tadā mama āgamanaṁ ārocetha, ārakkhañcassa
atk-s0508a11:380_5: karothā’’ti dve yakkhe āṇāpetvā pakkāmi. Te therassa samīpe ṭhatvā manasikāraṁ paṭisaṁharitvā
atk-s0508a11:380_6: nisinnakāle ārocesuṁ. Taṁ sutvā thero ‘‘tumhe mama vacanena vessavaṇamahārājassa
atk-s0508a11:380_7: kathetha, bhagavatā attano sāsane ṭhitānaṁ satiārakkhā nāma ṭhapitā atthi, sāyeva
atk-s0508a11:380_8: mādise rakkhati, tvaṁ tattha appossukko hohi, bhagavato ovāde ṭhitānaṁ edisāya ārakkhāya
atk-s0508a11:380_9: karaṇīyaṁ natthī’’ti te vissajjetvā tāvadeva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā vijjāttayaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:380_10: Tato vessavaṇo nivattamāno therassa samīpaṁ patvā mukhākārasallakkhaṇenevassa katakiccabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:380_11: ñatvā sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhagavato ārocetvā satthu sammukhā theraṁ abhitthavanto –
atk-s0508a11:383: Imāya gāthāya therassa guṇe vaṇṇesi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.21.15-20) –
atk-s0508a11:392: ‘‘Pacchime ca bhave asmiṁ, jātohaṁ brāhmaṇe kule;
atk-s0508a11:393: Saddhiṁ tīhi sahāyehi, pabbajiṁ satthu sāsane.
atk-s0508a11:395_0: Athāyasmā sambhūto bhagavantaṁ dassanāya gacchante bhikkhū disvā ‘‘āvuso, mama vacanena
atk-s0508a11:395_1: bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha, evañca vadethā’’ti vatvā dhammādhikaraṇaṁ attano
atk-s0508a11:395_2: satthu aviheṭhitabhāvaṁ pakāsento ‘‘yo sītavana’’nti gāthamāha. Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:395_3: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā sambhūtattherassa sāsanaṁ sampavedentā, ‘‘āyasmā, bhante,
atk-s0508a11:395_4: sambhūto bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadatī’’ti vatvā taṁ gāthaṁ ārocesuṁ,
atk-s0508a11:395_5: taṁ sutvā bhagavā ‘‘paṇḍito, bhikkhave, sambhūto bhikkhu paccapādi dhammassānudhammaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:395_6: na ca maṁ dhammādhikaraṇaṁ viheṭheti. Vessavaṇena tassattho mayhaṁ ārocitā’’ti āha.
atk-s0508a11:396_0: 6. Yaṁ pana te bhikkhū sambhūtattherena vuttaṁ ‘‘yo sītavana’’nti gāthaṁ satthu nivedesuṁ.
atk-s0508a11:396_1: Tattha sītavananti evaṁnāmakaṁ rājagahasamīpe mahantaṁ bheravasusānavanaṁ. Upagāti
atk-s0508a11:396_2: nivāsanavasena upagacchi. Etena bhagavatā anuññātaṁ pabbajitānurūpaṁ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:396_3: dasseti. Bhikkhūti saṁsārabhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesatāya ca bhikkhu. Ekoti adutiyo,
atk-s0508a11:396_4: etena kāyavivekaṁ dasseti. Santusitoti santuṭṭho. Etena catupaccayasantosalakkhaṇaṁ
atk-s0508a11:396_5: ariyavaṁsaṁ dasseti. Samāhitattoti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā samāhitacitto, etena
atk-s0508a11:396_6: cittavivekabhāvanāmukhena bhāvanārāmaṁ ariyavaṁsaṁ dasseti. Vijitāvīti sāsane sammāpaṭipajjantena
atk-s0508a11:396_7: vijetabbaṁ kilesagaṇaṁ vijitvā ṭhito, etena upadhivivekaṁ dasseti. Bhayahetūnaṁ kilesānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:396_8: apagatattā apetalomahaṁso, etena sammāpaṭipattiyā phalaṁ dasseti. Rakkhanti rakkhanto.
atk-s0508a11:396_9: Kāyagatāsatinti kāyārammaṇaṁ satiṁ, kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṁ paribrūhanavasena avissajjento.
atk-s0508a11:396_10: Dhitimāti dhīro, samāhitattaṁ vijitāvibhāvataṁ vā upādāya paṭipattidassanametaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:396_11: Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – so bhikkhu vivekasukhānupekkhāya eko sītavanaṁ upāgami,
atk-s0508a11:396_12: upāgato ca lolabhāvābhāvato santuṭṭho dhitimā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṁ bhāvento tathādhigataṁ
atk-s0508a11:396_13: jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā āraddhavipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā adhigatena aggamaggena samāhito
atk-s0508a11:396_14: vijitāvī ca hutvā katakiccatāya bhayahetūnaṁ sabbaso apagatattā apetalomahaṁso jātoti.
atk-s0508a11:399_0: Yopānudīti āyasmato bhalliyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira ito ekatiṁse kappe
atk-s0508a11:399_1: anuppanne buddhe sumanassa nāma paccekabuddhassa pasannacitto phalāphalaṁ datvā sugatīsu
atk-s0508a11:399_2: eva saṁsaranto sikhissa sammāsambuddhassa kāle aruṇavatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto
atk-s0508a11:399_3: ‘‘sikhissa bhagavato paṭhamābhisambuddhassa ujita, ojitā nāma dve satthavāhaputtā
atk-s0508a11:399_4: paṭhamāhāraṁ adaṁsū’’ti sutvā attano sahāyakena saddhiṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a11:399_5: vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā mahādānaṁ pavattetvā patthanaṁ akaṁsu – ‘‘ubhopi mayaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:399_6: bhante, anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa paṭhamāhāradāyakā bhaveyyāmā’’ti. Te tattha
atk-s0508a11:399_7: tattha bhave puññakammaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsarantā kassapassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a11:399_8: gopālakaseṭṭhissa puttā bhātaro hutvā nibbattā. Bahūni vassāni bhikkhusaṅghaṁ khīrabhojanena
atk-s0508a11:399_9: upaṭṭhahiṁsu. Amhākaṁ pana bhagavato kāle pokkharavatīnagare satthavāhassa puttā
atk-s0508a11:399_10: bhātaro hutvā nibbattā. Tesu jeṭṭho taphusso nāma, kaniṭṭho bhalliyo nāma, te pañcamattāni
atk-s0508a11:399_11: sakaṭasatāni bhaṇḍassa pūretvā vāṇijjāya gacchantā bhagavati paṭhamābhisambuddhe
atk-s0508a11:399_12: sattasattāhaṁ vimuttisukhadhammapaccavekkhaṇāhi vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe rājāyatanamūle
atk-s0508a11:399_13: viharante rājāyatanassa avidūre mahāmaggena atikkamanti, tesaṁ tasmiṁ samaye samepi
atk-s0508a11:399_14: bhūmibhāge akaddamodake sakaṭāni nappavattiṁsu, ‘‘kiṁ nu, kho, kāraṇa’’nti ca cintentānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:399_15: porāṇasālohitā devatā rukkhaviṭapantare attānaṁ dassentī āha – ‘‘mādisā, ayaṁ bhagavā
atk-s0508a11:399_16: acirābhisambuddho sattasattāhaṁ anāhāro vimuttisukhāpaṭisaṁvedī idāni rājāyatanamūle
atk-s0508a11:399_17: nisinno, taṁ āhārena paṭimānetha, yadassa tumhākaṁ dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā’’ti.
atk-s0508a11:399_18: Taṁ sutvā te uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedentā, ‘‘āhārasampādanaṁ papañca’’nti
atk-s0508a11:399_19: maññamānā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca bhagavato datvā dvevācikasaraṇaṁ gantvā kesadhātuyo
atk-s0508a11:399_20: labhitvā agamaṁsu. Te hi paṭhamaṁ upāsakā ahesuṁ. Atha bhagavati bārāṇasiṁ gantvā
atk-s0508a11:399_21: dhammacakkaṁ pavattetvā anupubbena rājagahe viharante taphussabhalliyā rājagahaṁ
atk-s0508a11:399_22: upagatā bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Tesaṁ bhagavā dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:399_23: desesi. Tesu taphusso sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya upāsakova ahosi. Bhalliyo pana pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:399_24: chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.48.66-70) –
atk-s0508a11:402: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a11:405: Athekadivasaṁ māro bhalliyattherassa bhiṁsāpanatthaṁ bhayānakaṁ rūpaṁ dassesi. So attano sabbabhayātikkamaṁ pakāsento ‘‘yopānudī’’ti gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:406_0: 7. Tattha yopānudīti yo apānudi khipi pajahi viddhaṁsesi. Maccurājassāti maccu nāma
atk-s0508a11:406_1: maraṇaṁ khandhānaṁ bhedo, so eva ca sattānaṁ attano vase anuvattāpanato issaraṭṭhena
atk-s0508a11:406_2: rājāti maccurājā, tassa. Senanti jarārogādiṁ, sā hissa vasavattane aṅgabhāvato senā
atk-s0508a11:406_3: nāma, tena hesa mahatā nānāvidhena vipulena ‘‘mahāseno’’ti vuccati. Yathāha – ‘‘na
atk-s0508a11:406_4: hi no saṅgaraṁ tena, mahāsenena maccunā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.272; jā. 2.22.121; netti.
atk-s0508a11:406_5: 103). Atha vā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena ‘‘maccū’’ti idha devaputtamāro adhippeto, tassa ca
atk-s0508a11:407: ‘‘Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
atk-s0508a11:408: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
atk-s0508a11:410: Sattamī vicikicchā te, māno makkho ca aṭṭhamī’’ti. (su. ni. 438-439; mahāni. 28;cūḷani. nandamāṇavapucchāniddesa 47);
atk-s0508a11:411_0: Naḷasetuṁvasudubbalaṁ mahoghoti sāravirahitato naḷasetusadisaṁ ativiya abalabhāvato
atk-s0508a11:411_1: suṭṭhu dubbalaṁ saṁkilesasenaṁ navalokuttaradhammānaṁ mahābalavabhāvato mahoghasadisena
atk-s0508a11:411_2: aggamaggena yo apānudi vijitāvī apetabheravo danto, so parinibbuto ṭhitattoti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:411_3: Taṁ sutvā māro ‘‘jānāti maṁ samaṇo’’ti tatthevantaradhāyīti.
atk-s0508a11:414_0: Yoduddamiyoti āyasmato vīrattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira ito ekanavute kappe
atk-s0508a11:414_1: vipassissa bhagavato vasanaāvāsaṁ paṭijaggi. Ekadivasañca sindhuvārapupphasadisāni
atk-s0508a11:414_2: nigguṇṭhipupphāni gahetvā bhagavantaṁ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:414_3: saṁsaranto ito pañcatiṁse kappe khattiyakule nibbattitvā mahāpatāpo nāma rājā ahosi
atk-s0508a11:414_4: cakkavattī. So dhammena samena rajjaṁ kārento satte saggamagge patiṭṭhāpesi. Puna
atk-s0508a11:414_5: imasmiṁ kappe kassapassa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:414_6: dānaṁ dento saṅghassa khīrabhattaṁ adāsi. Evaṁ tattha tattha dānamayaṁ puññasambhāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:414_7: karonto itarañca nibbānatthaṁ sambharanto devamanussesu saṁsaritvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:414_8: sāvatthinagare rañño pasenadissa amaccakule nibbatti, ‘‘vīro’’tissa nāmaṁ akaṁsu.
atk-s0508a11:414_9: So vayappatto nāmānugatehi pattabalajavādiguṇehi samannāgato saṅgāmasūro hutvā mātāpitūhi
atk-s0508a11:414_10: nibandhavasena kārite dārapariggahe ekaṁyeva puttaṁ labhitvā pubbahetunā codiyamāno
atk-s0508a11:414_11: kāmesu saṁsāre ca ādīnavaṁ disvā saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a11:414_12: chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.21.21-24) –
atk-s0508a11:422_0: Evaṁ pana arahattaṁ patvā phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmentaṁ theraṁ purāṇadutiyikā
atk-s0508a11:422_1: uppabbājetukāmā antarantarā nānānayehi palobhetuṁ parakkamantī ekadivasaṁ divāvihāraṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:422_2: gantvā itthikuttādīni dassetuṁ ārabhi. Athāyasmā vīro ‘‘maṁ palobhetukāmā sineruṁ
atk-s0508a11:422_3: makasapakkhavātena cāletukāmā viya yāva bālā vatāyaṁ itthī’’ti tassā kiriyāya niratthakabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:423_0: 8. Tattha yo duddamiyotiādīnaṁ padānaṁ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Idaṁ panettha yojanāmattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:423_1: yo pubbe adanta kilesatāya paccatthikehi vā saṅgamasīse dametuṁ jetuṁ asakkuṇeyyatāyaduddamiyo,
atk-s0508a11:423_2: idāni pana uttamena damena danto catubbidhasammappamadhānavīriyasampattiyā vīro,
atk-s0508a11:423_3: vuttanayeneva santusito vitiṇṇakaṅkho vijitāvī apetalomahaṁso vīro vīranāmako anavasesato
atk-s0508a11:423_4: kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto, tato eva ṭhitasabhāvo, na tādisānaṁ satenapi sahassenapi
atk-s0508a11:423_5: cālanīyoti. Taṁ sutvā sā itthī – ‘‘mayhaṁ sāmike evaṁ paṭipanne ko mayhaṁ gharāvāsena
atk-s0508a11:423_6: attho’’ti saṁvegajātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā nacirasseva tevijjā ahosīti.
atk-s0508a11:426_0: Svāgatanti āyasmato pilindavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0508a11:426_1: haṁsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva satthu santike dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:426_2: suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ devatānaṁ piyamanāpabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ
atk-s0508a11:426_3: disvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetvā yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a11:426_4: sumedhassa bhagavato kāle manussaloke nibbattitvā bhagavati parinibbute satthu thūpassa
atk-s0508a11:426_5: pūjaṁ katvā saṅghe ca mahādānaṁ pavattetvā tato cuto devamanussesu eva saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a11:426_6: anuppanne buddhe cakkavattī rājā hutvā mahājanaṁ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā saggaparāyaṇaṁ
atk-s0508a11:426_7: akāsi. So anuppanneyeva amhākaṁ bhagavati sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇagehe nibbatti. ‘‘Pilindo’’tissa
atk-s0508a11:426_8: nāmaṁ akaṁsu. Vacchoti pana gottaṁ . Tena so aparabhāge ‘‘pilindavaccho’’ti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a11:426_9: Saṁsāre pana saṁvegabahulatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā cūḷagandhāraṁ nāma
atk-s0508a11:426_10: vijjaṁ sādhetvā tāya vijjāya ākāsacārī paracittavidū ca hutvā rājagahe lābhaggayasaggappatto paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a11:427_0: Atha yadā amhākaṁ bhagavā abhisambuddho hutvā anukkamena rājagahaṁ upagato, tato
atk-s0508a11:427_1: paṭṭhāya buddhānubhāvena tassa sā vijjā na sampajjati, attano kiccaṁ na sādheti.
atk-s0508a11:427_2: So cintesi – ‘‘sutaṁ kho pana metaṁ ācariyapācariyānaṁ bhāsamānānaṁ ‘yattha mahāgandhāravijjā
atk-s0508a11:427_3: dharati, tattha cūḷagandhāravijjā na sampajjatī’ti, samaṇassa pana gotamassa āgatakālato
atk-s0508a11:427_4: paṭṭhāya nāyaṁ mama vijjā sampajjati, nissaṁsayaṁ samaṇo gotamo mahāgandhāravijjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:427_5: jānāti, yaṁnūnāhaṁ taṁ payirupāsitvā tassa santike taṁ vijjaṁ pariyāpuṇeyya’’nti.
atk-s0508a11:427_6: So bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca – ‘‘ahaṁ, mahāsamaṇa, tava santike ekaṁ vijjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:427_7: pariyāpuṇitukāmo, okāsaṁ me karohī’’ti. Bhagavā ‘‘tena hi pabbajā’’ti āha. So ‘‘vijjāya
atk-s0508a11:427_8: parikammaṁ pabbajjā’’ti maññamāno pabbaji. Tassa bhagavā dhammaṁ kathetvā caritānukūlaṁ
atk-s0508a11:427_9: kammaṭṭhānaṁ adāsi. So upanissayasampannatāya nacirasseva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:427_10: pāpuṇi. Yā pana purimajātiyaṁ tassovāde ṭhatvā sagge nibbattā devatā, taṁ kataññutaṁ
atk-s0508a11:427_11: nissāya sañjātabahumānā sāyaṁ pātaṁ theraṁ payirupāsitvā gacchanti. Tasmā thero devatānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:427_12: piyamanāpatāya aggataṁ patto. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.2.55-67) –
atk-s0508a11:433: Sumedho nāma nāmena, anumodittha so tadā.
atk-s0508a11:440: ‘‘Na te bījaṁ pavappanti, napi nīyanti naṅgalā;
atk-s0508a11:444: ‘‘Na maṁ mittā amittā vā, hiṁsanti sabbapāṇino;
atk-s0508a11:453_0: Tathā devatāhi ativiya piyāyitabbabhāvato imaṁ theraṁ bhagavā devatānaṁ piyamanāpabhāvena
atk-s0508a11:453_1: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi – ‘‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ devatānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:453_2: piyamanāpānaṁ yadidaṁ pilindavaccho’’ti (a. ni. 1.209, 215) so ekadivasaṁ bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0508a11:453_3: nisinno attano guṇe paccavekkhitvā tesaṁ kāraṇabhūtaṁ vijjānimittaṁ bhagavato santike
atk-s0508a11:454_0: 9. Tattha svāgatanti sundaraṁ āgamanaṁ, idaṁ mamāti sambandho. Atha vā svāgatanti
atk-s0508a11:454_1: suṭṭhu āgataṁ, mayāti vibhatti vipariṇāmetabbā. Nāpagatanti na apagataṁ hitābhivuddhito
atk-s0508a11:454_2: na apetaṁ. Nayidaṁ dumantitaṁ mamāti idaṁ mama duṭṭhu kathitaṁ, duṭṭhu vā vīmaṁsitaṁ
atk-s0508a11:454_3: na hoti. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yaṁ bhagavato santike mamāgamanaṁ, yaṁ vā mayā tattha
atk-s0508a11:454_4: āgataṁ, taṁ svāgataṁ, svāgatattāyeva na durāgataṁ. Yaṁ ‘‘bhagavato santike dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:454_5: sutvā pabbajissāmī’’ti mama mantitaṁ gaditaṁ kathitaṁ, cittena vā vīmaṁsitaṁ idampi
atk-s0508a11:454_6: na dummantinti. Idāni tattha kāraṇaṁ dassento ‘‘saṁvibhattesū’’tiādimāha. Saṁvibhattesūti
atk-s0508a11:454_7: pakārato vibhattesu. Dhammesūti ñeyyadhammesu samathadhammesu vā, nānātitthiyehi
atk-s0508a11:454_8: pakatiādivasena, sammāsambuddhehi dukkhādivasena saṁvibhajitvā vuttadhammesu. Yaṁ
atk-s0508a11:454_9: seṭṭhaṁ tadupāgaminti yaṁ tattha seṭṭhaṁ, taṁ catusaccadhammaṁ, tassa vā bodhakaṁ
atk-s0508a11:454_10: sāsanadhammaṁ upāgamiṁ, ‘‘ayaṁ dhammo ayaṁ vinayo’’ti upagacchiṁ. Sammāsambuddhehi
atk-s0508a11:454_11: eva vā kusalādivasena khandhādivasena yathāsabhāvato saṁvibhattesu sabhāvadhammesu
atk-s0508a11:454_12: yaṁ tattha seṭṭhaṁ uttamaṁ pavaraṁ, taṁ maggaphalanibbānadhammaṁ upāgamiṁ, attapaccakkhato
atk-s0508a11:454_13: upagacchiṁ sacchākāsiṁ, tasmā svāgataṁ mama na apagataṁ sumantitaṁ na dummantitanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:457_0: Vihariapekkhanti āyasmato puṇṇamāsattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira vipassissa
atk-s0508a11:457_1: bhagavato kāle cakkavākayoniyaṁ nibbatto bhagavantaṁ gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:457_2: attano mukhatuṇḍakena sālapupphaṁ gahetvā pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:457_3: saṁsaranto ito sattarase kappe aṭṭhakkhattuṁ cakkavattī rājā ahosi. Imasmiṁ pana
atk-s0508a11:457_4: kappe kassapassa bhagavato sāsane osakkamāne kuṭumbiyakule nibbattitvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:457_5: samaṇadhammaṁ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare
atk-s0508a11:457_6: samiddhissa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa jātadivase tasmiṁ gehe sabbā
atk-s0508a11:457_7: rittakumbhiyo suvaṇṇamāsānaṁ puṇṇā ahesuṁ. Tenassa puṇṇamāsoti nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a11:457_8: brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ patvā vivāhakammaṁ katvā ekaṁ puttaṁ labhitvā upanissayasampannatāya
atk-s0508a11:457_9: gharāvāsaṁ jigucchanto bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:457_11: ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.7.13-19) –
atk-s0508a11:463: Tena cittappasādena, duggatiṁ so na gacchati.
atk-s0508a11:471_0: Athassa purāṇadutiyikā taṁ palobhetukāmā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā puttena saddhiṁ upagantvā
atk-s0508a11:471_1: piyālāpabhāvādikehi bhāvavivaraṇakammaṁ nāma kātuṁ ārabhi. Thero tassā kāraṇaṁ disvā
atk-s0508a11:471_2: attano katthacipi alaggabhāvaṁ pakāsento ‘‘vihari apekkha’’nti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:472_0: 10. Tattha viharīti visesato hari apahari apanesi. Apekkhanti taṇhaṁ. Idhāti imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:472_1: loke attabhāve vā. Huranti aparasmiṁ anāgate attabhāve vā. Idhāti vā ajjhattikesu
atk-s0508a11:472_2: āyatanesu. Huranti bāhiresu . Vā-saddo samuccayattho ‘‘apadā vā dvipadā vā’’tiādīsu
atk-s0508a11:472_3: (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34; 5.32) viya. Yoti attānameva paraṁ viya dasseti. Vedagūti
atk-s0508a11:472_4: vedena gato maggañāṇena nibbānaṁ gato adhigato, cattāri vā saccāni pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena
atk-s0508a11:472_5: abhisamecca ṭhito. Yatattoti maggasaṁvarena saṁyatasabhāvo, sammāvāyāmena vā saṁyatasabhāvo.
atk-s0508a11:472_6: Sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittoti sabbesu ārammaṇesu dhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhilepavasena na
atk-s0508a11:472_7: upalitto, tena lābhādilokadhamme samatikkamaṁ dasseti. Lokassāti upādānakkhandhapañcakassa.
atk-s0508a11:472_8: Tañhi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko. Jaññāti jānitvā. Udayabbayañcāti uppādañceva vayañca,
atk-s0508a11:472_9: etena yathāvuttaguṇānaṁ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṁ dasseti. Ayaṁ panettha attho – yo sakalassa
atk-s0508a11:472_10: khandhādilokassa samapaññāsāya ākārehi udayabbayaṁ jānitvā vedagū yatatto katthaci
atk-s0508a11:472_11: anupalitto, so sabbattha apekkhaṁ vineyya santusito tādisānaṁ vippakārānaṁ na kiñci
atk-s0508a11:472_12: maññati, tasmā tvaṁ andhabāle yathāgatamaggeneva gacchāti. Atha sā itthī ‘‘ayaṁ samaṇo
atk-s0508a11:472_13: mayi putte ca nirapekkho, na sakkā imaṁ palobhetu’’nti pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a11:478_0: Pāmojjabahuloti āyasmato cūḷavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a11:478_1: bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā paresaṁ bhatiyā jīvikaṁ kappento bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:478_2: sāvakaṁ sujātaṁ nāma theraṁ paṁsukūlaṁ pariyesantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a11:478_3: vatthaṁ datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. So tena puññakammena tettiṁsakkhattuṁ devarajjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:478_4: kāresi. Sattasattatikkhattuṁ cakkavattī rājā ahosi. Anekavāraṁ padesarājā. Evaṁ devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:478_5: saṁsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a11:478_6: ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ devamanussagatīsu aparāparaṁ parivattanto amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a11:478_7: kosambiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Cūḷavacchotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu
atk-s0508a11:478_8: nipphattiṁ gato buddhaguṇe sutvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkami, tassa bhagavā
atk-s0508a11:478_9: dhammaṁ kathesi. So paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado katapubbakicco caritānukūlaṁ
atk-s0508a11:478_10: kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā bhāvento vihari. Tena ca samayena kosambikā bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā
atk-s0508a11:478_11: ahesuṁ. Tadā cūḷavacchatthero ubhayesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ laddhiṁ anādāya bhagavatā dinnovāde
atk-s0508a11:478_12: ṭhatvā vipassanaṁ brūhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.50.31-40) –
atk-s0508a11:494_0: Atha cūḷavacchatthero arahattaṁ patvā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kalahābhiratiyā sakatthavināsaṁ
atk-s0508a11:494_1: disvā dhammasaṁvegappatto, attano ca pattavisesaṁ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassavasena
atk-s0508a11:495_0: 11. Tattha pāmojjabahuloti suparisuddhasīlatāya vippaṭisārābhāvato adhikusalesu dhammesu
atk-s0508a11:495_1: abhirativasena pamodabahulo. Tenevāha ‘‘dhamme buddhappavedite’’ti. Tattha dhammeti.
atk-s0508a11:495_2: Sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhamme navavidhe vā lokuttaradhamme. So hi sabbaññubuddhena
atk-s0508a11:495_3: sāmukkaṁsikāya desanāya pakāsitattā sātisayaṁ buddhappavedito nāma. Tassa pana adhigamūpāyabhāvato
atk-s0508a11:495_4: desanādhammopi idha labbhateva. Padaṁ santanti nibbānaṁ sandhāya vadati. Evarūpo
atk-s0508a11:495_5: hi bhikkhu santaṁ padaṁ santaṁ koṭṭhāsaṁ sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ upasamabhāvato saṅkhārūpasamaṁ
atk-s0508a11:495_6: paramasukhatāya sukhaṁ nibbānaṁ adhigacchati vindatiyeva. Parisuddhasīlo hi bhikkhu
atk-s0508a11:495_7: vippaṭisārābhāvena pāmojjabahulo saddhamme yuttappayutto vimuttipariyosānā sabbasampattiyo
atk-s0508a11:495_8: pāpuṇāti. Yathāha – ‘‘avippaṭisāratthāni kho , ānanda, kusalāni sīlāni, avippaṭisāro
atk-s0508a11:495_9: pāmojjatthāyā’’tiādi (a. ni. 10.1). Atha vā pāmojjabahuloti sammāsambuddho bhagavā,
atk-s0508a11:495_10: svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅghoti ratanattayaṁ sandhāya pamodabahulo. Tattha
atk-s0508a11:495_11: pana so pamodabahulo kiṁ vā karotīti āha ‘‘dhamme buddhappavedite’’tiādi. Saddhāsampannassa
atk-s0508a11:495_13: sambhavato sampattiyo hatthagatā eva honti, yathāha – ‘‘saddhājāto upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0508a11:498_0: Paññābalīti āyasmato mahāvacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a11:498_1: bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pānīyadānamadāsi. Puna sikhissa bhagavato kāle upāsako
atk-s0508a11:498_2: hutvā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ bahuṁ puññakammaṁ akāsi, so tehi puññakammehi tattha tattha
atk-s0508a11:498_3: sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nāḷakagāme samiddhissa
atk-s0508a11:498_4: nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Tassa mahāvacchoti nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a11:498_5: āyasmato sāriputtassa bhagavato sāvakabhāvaṁ sutvā ‘‘sopi nāma mahāpañño. Yassa sāvakattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:498_6: upāgato, so eva maññe imasmiṁ loke aggapuggalo’’ti bhagavati saddhaṁ uppādetvā satthu
atk-s0508a11:498_7: santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a11:507: Evaṁ pana arahattaṁ patvā vimuttisukhaṁ anubhavanto sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvavibhāvanena sabrahmacārīnaṁ ussāhajananatthaṁ ‘‘paññābalī’’ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:508_0: 12. Tattha paññābalīti pārihāriyapaññāya vipassanāpaññāya ca vasena abhiṇhaso sātisayena
atk-s0508a11:508_1: paññābalena samannāgato. Sīlavatūpapannoti ukkaṁsagatena catupārisuddhisīlena, dhutadhammasaṅkhātehi
atk-s0508a11:508_2: vatehi ca upapanno samannāgato. Samāhitoti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā samāhito.
atk-s0508a11:508_3: Jhānaratoti tato eva ārammaṇūpanijjhāne lakkhaṇūpanijjhāne ca rato satatābhiyutto.
atk-s0508a11:508_4: Sabbakālaṁ satiyā avippavāsavasena satimā. Yadatthiyanti atthato anapetaṁ atthiyaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:508_5: yena atthiyaṁ yadatthiyaṁ. Yathā paccaye paribhuñjantassa paribhuñjanaṁ atthiyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:508_6: hoti, tathā bhojanaṁ bhuñjamāno. Sāmiparibhogena hi taṁ atthiyaṁ hoti dāyajjaparibhogena
atk-s0508a11:508_7: vā, na aññathā bhojananti ca nidassanamattaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Bhuñjiyati paribhuñjiyatīti
atk-s0508a11:508_8: vā bhojanaṁ, cattāro paccayā. ‘‘Yadatthika’’nti vā pāṭho. Yadatthaṁ yassatthāya satthārā
atk-s0508a11:508_9: paccayā anuññātā, tadatthaṁ kāyassa ṭhitiādiatthaṁ, tañca anupādisesanibbānatthaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:508_10: Tasmā anupādāparinibbānatthaṁ bhojanapaccaye bhuñjamāno tato eva kaṅkhetha kālaṁ
atk-s0508a11:508_11: attano anupādāparinibbānakālaṁ āgameyya. Idha imasmiṁ sāsane vītarāgo. Bāhirakassa
atk-s0508a11:508_12: pana kāmesu vītarāgassa idaṁ natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:511_0: Nīlabbhavaṇṇāti āyasmato vanavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira atthadassino
atk-s0508a11:511_1: bhagavato kāle kacchapayoniyaṁ nibbatto vinatāya nāma nadiyā vasati. Tassa khuddakanāvappamāṇo
atk-s0508a11:511_2: attabhāvo ahosi. So kira ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ nadiyā tīre ṭhitaṁ disvā, ‘‘pāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:511_3: gantukāmo maññe bhagavā’’ti attano piṭṭhiyaṁ āropetvā netukāmo pādamūle nipajji.
