atk-s0508a11:2224_8: pana amhehi pariyesitabba’’nti saṁsāre jātasaṁvego gharāvāsaṁ pahāya satthu santike
atk-s0508a11:2224_9: pabbajitvā bhagavatā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne niyojito tattha patiṭṭhāya paṭiladdhajhānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2224_10: pādakaṁ katvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena
atk-s0508a11:2229: ‘‘Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a11:2234: Arahattaṁ pana patvā dhamme gāravabahumānena pītivegavissaṭṭhaṁ udānaṁ udānento ‘‘na tathā mataṁ satarasa’’nti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2235_0: 91. Tattha na tathā mataṁ satarasaṁ, sudhannaṁ yaṁ mayajja paribhuttanti tathāti
atk-s0508a11:2235_1: tena pakārena. Matanti abhimataṁ. Satarasanti satarasabhojanaṁ ‘‘satarasabhojanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2235_2: nāma satapākasappiādīhi abhisaṅkhataṁ bhojana’’nti vadanti. Atha vā anekattho satasaddo
atk-s0508a11:2235_3: ‘‘sataso sahassaso’’tiādīsu viya. Tasmā yaṁ bhojanaṁ anekasūpaṁ anekabyañjanaṁ, taṁ
atk-s0508a11:2235_4: anekarasatāya ‘‘satarasa’’nti vuccati, nānārasabhojananti attho. Sudhā eva annaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2235_5: sudhābhojanaṁ devānaṁ āhāro. Yaṁ mayajja paribhuttanti yaṁ mayā ajja anubhuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2235_6: ‘‘Yaṁ mayā paribhutta’’nti ca idaṁ ‘‘satarasaṁ sudhanna’’nti etthāpi yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2235_7: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yaṁ mayā ajja etarahi nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena phalasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena
atk-s0508a11:2235_8: ca accantameva santaṁ paṇītaṁ nibbānasukhaṁ paribhuñjiyamānaṁ, taṁ yathā mataṁ abhimataṁ
atk-s0508a11:2235_9: sambhāvitaṁ tathā rājakāle mayā paribhuttaṁ satarasabhojanaṁ devattabhāve paribhuttaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2235_10: sudhannañca na mataṁ nābhimataṁ. Kasmā? Idañhi ariyanisevitaṁ nirāmisaṁ kilesānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2235_11: avatthubhūtaṁ, taṁ pana puthujjanasevitaṁ sāmisaṁ kilesānaṁ vatthubhūtaṁ, taṁ imassa
atk-s0508a11:2235_12: saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upetīti. Idāni ‘‘yaṁ mayajja paribhutta’’nti vuttadhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2235_13: desento aparimitadassinā gotamena, buddhena sudesito dhammo’’ti āha. Tassattho –
atk-s0508a11:2235_14: aparimitaṁ aparicchinnaṁ uppādavayābhāvato santaṁ asaṅkhatadhātuṁ sayambhūñāṇena
atk-s0508a11:2235_15: passī, aparimitassa anantāparimeyyassa ñeyyassa dassāvīti tena aparimitadassinā gotamagottena
atk-s0508a11:2235_16: sammāsambuddhena ‘‘khayaṁ virāgaṁ amataṁ paṇīta’’nti (khu. pā. 6.4; su. ni. 227)
atk-s0508a11:2235_18: (a. ni. 5.140; 10.6) ca ādinā suṭṭhu desito dhammo, nibbānaṁ mayā ajja paribhuttanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a11:2238_0: Yassāsavāparikkhīṇāti āyasmato vijayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2238_1: katādhikāro piyadassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2238_2: patto satthari parinibbute tassa thūpassa ratanakhacitaṁ vedikaṁ kāretvā tattha uḷāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:2238_3: vedikāmahaṁ kāresi. So tena puññakammena anekasate attabhāve maṇiobhāsena vicari.
atk-s0508a11:2238_4: Evaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2238_5: vijayotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ gato tāpasapabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2238_6: pabbajitvā araññāyatane jhānalābhī hutvā viharanto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā uppannappasādo
atk-s0508a11:2238_7: satthu santikaṁ upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Tassa satthā dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2238_8: desesi. So dhammaṁ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2242: Vedikāya mahaṁ katvā, tattha kālaṅkato ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2248: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākaronto ‘‘yassāsavā parikkhīṇā’’ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2249_0: 92. Tattha yassāsavā parikkhīṇāti yassa uttamapuggalassa kāmāsavādayo cattāro āsavā
atk-s0508a11:2249_1: sabbaso khīṇā ariyamaggena khepitā. Āhāre ca anissitoti yo ca āhāre taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi
atk-s0508a11:2249_2: anissito agadhito anajjhāpanno, nidassanamattaṁ, āhārasīsenettha cattāropi paccayā
atk-s0508a11:2249_3: gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Paccayapariyāyo vā idha āhāra-saddo veditabbo. ‘‘Suññato animitto
atk-s0508a11:2249_4: cā’’ti ettha appaṇihitavimokkhopi gahitoyeva, tīṇipi cetāni nibbānasseva nāmāni.
atk-s0508a11:2249_5: Nibbānañhi rāgādīnaṁ abhāvena suññaṁ, tehi vimuttañcāti suññatavimokkho, tathā rāgādinimittābhāvena
atk-s0508a11:2249_6: saṅkhāranimittābhāvena ca animittaṁ , tehi vimuttañcāti animittavimokkho, rāgādipaṇidhīnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2249_7: abhāvena appaṇihitaṁ, tehi vimuttañcāti appaṇihito vimokkhoti vuccati. Phalasamāpattivasena
atk-s0508a11:2249_8: taṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā viharantassa ayampi tividho vimokkho yassa gocaro, ākāseva sakuntānaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2249_9: padaṁ tassa durannayanti yathā ākāse gacchantānaṁ sakuṇānaṁ ‘‘imasmiṁ ṭhāne pādehi
atk-s0508a11:2249_10: akkamitvā gatā, idaṁ ṭhānaṁ urena paharitvā gatā, idaṁ sīsena, idaṁ pakkhehī’’ti
atk-s0508a11:2249_11: na sakkā ñātuṁ, evameva evarūpassa bhikkhuno ‘‘nirayapadādīsu iminā nāma padena gato’’ti
atk-s0508a11:2252_0: Dukkhā kāmā erakāti āyasmato erakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2252_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a11:2252_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso satthu kiñci
atk-s0508a11:2252_3: dātabbayuttakaṁ alabhanto ‘‘handāhaṁ kāyasāraṁ puññaṁ karissāmī’’ti satthu gamanamaggaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2252_4: sodhetvā samaṁ akāsi. Satthā tena tathākataṁ maggaṁ paṭipajji . So tattha bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2252_5: disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā añjaliṁ paggayha pasannacitto yāva dassanupacārasamatikkamā
atk-s0508a11:2252_6: buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ avijahanto aṭṭhāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2252_7: puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ sambhāvanīyassa
atk-s0508a11:2252_8: kuṭumbiyassa putto hutvā nibbatti, erakotissa nāmaṁ ahosi abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko
atk-s0508a11:2252_9: itikattabbatāsu paramena veyyattiyena samannāgato. Tassa mātāpitaro kulena rūpena
atk-s0508a11:2252_10: ācārena vayena kosallena ca anucchavikaṁ dārikaṁ ānetvā vivāhakammaṁ akaṁsu . So
atk-s0508a11:2252_11: tāya saddhiṁ saṁvāsena gehe vasanto pacchimabhavikattā kenacideva saṁvegavatthunā
atk-s0508a11:2252_12: saṁsāre saṁviggamānaso satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji,
atk-s0508a11:2252_13: tassa satthā kammaṭṭhānaṁ adāsi. So kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā katipayadivasātikkamena
atk-s0508a11:2252_14: ukkaṇṭhābhibhūto vihāsi. Atha satthā tassa cittappavattiṁ ñatvā ovādavasena ‘‘dukkhā
atk-s0508a11:2252_15: kāmā erakā’’ti gāthaṁ abhāsi. So taṁ sutvā ‘‘ayuttaṁ mayā kataṁ, yohaṁ evarūpassa
atk-s0508a11:2252_16: satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā taṁ vissajjento micchāvitakkabahulo vihāsi’’nti
atk-s0508a11:2252_17: saṁvegajāto vipassanāya yuttappayutto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a11:2264: ‘‘Dukkhā kāmā eraka, na sukhā kāmā eraka;
atk-s0508a11:2265: Yo kāme kāmayati, dukkhaṁ so kāmayati eraka;
atk-s0508a11:2266: Yo kāme na kāmayati, dukkhaṁ so na kāmayati erakā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a11:2268_0: Tattha dukkhā kāmāti ime vatthukāmakilesakāmā dukkhavatthutāya vipariṇāmadukkhasaṁsāradukkhasabhāvato
atk-s0508a11:2268_1: ca, dukkhā dukkhamā dukkhanibbattikā. Vuttañhetaṁ – ‘‘appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā,
atk-s0508a11:2268_2: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo’’tiādi (pāci. 417; ma. ni. 1.234). Erakāti paṭhamaṁ tāva bhagavā
atk-s0508a11:2268_3: taṁ ālapati, pacchā pana thero attānaṁ nāmena kathesi. Na sukhā kāmāti kāmā nāmete
atk-s0508a11:2268_4: jānantassa sukhā na honti, ajānantassa pana sukhato upaṭṭhahanti. Yathāha – ‘‘yo
atk-s0508a11:2268_5: sukhaṁ dukkhato adda, dukkhamaddakkhi sallato’’tiādi (saṁ. ni. 4.253; itivu. 53;
atk-s0508a11:2268_6: theragā. 986). Yo kāme kāmayati, dukkhaṁ so kāmayatīti yo satto kilesakāmena vatthukāme
atk-s0508a11:2268_7: kāmayati, tassa taṁ kāmanaṁ sampati sapariḷāhatāya , āyatiṁ apāyadukkhahetutāya ca
atk-s0508a11:2268_8: vaṭṭadukkhahetutāya ca dukkhaṁ. Vatthukāmā pana dukkhassa vatthubhūtā. Iti so dukkhasabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2268_9: dukkhanimittaṁ dukkhavatthuñca kāmayatīti vutto. Itaraṁ paṭipakkhavasena tamevatthaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2268_10: ñāpetuṁ vuttaṁ, tasmā tassattho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo.
atk-s0508a11:2271_0: Namohi tassa bhagavatoti āyasmato mettajittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira anomadassissa
atk-s0508a11:2271_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto sāsane abhippasanno hutvā bodhirukkhassa
atk-s0508a11:2271_2: iṭṭhakāhi vedikaṁ cinitvā sudhāparikammaṁ kāresi. Satthā tassa anumodanaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2271_3: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:2271_4: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2271_5: nibbatti, mettajītissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto kāmesu ādīnavaṁ disvā tāpasapabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2271_6: pabbajitvā araññe viharanto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā pubbahetunā codiyamāno satthu santikaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2271_7: gantvā pavattinivattiyo ārabbha pañhaṁ pucchitvā satthārā pañhe vissajjite paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:2271_8: pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.15.26-31) –
atk-s0508a11:2275: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a11:2286: Tenāyaṁ aggappattena, aggadhammo sudesito’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2287_0: Tattha namoti namakkāro. Hīti nipātamattaṁ. Tassāti yo so bhagavā samattiṁsapāramiyo
atk-s0508a11:2287_1: pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho, sakyarājassa
atk-s0508a11:2287_2: puttoti sakyaputto. Anaññasādhāraṇāya puññasampattiyā ca sambhāvito uttamāya rūpakāyasiriyā
atk-s0508a11:2287_3: dhammakāyasiriyā ca samannāgatattā sirīmā, tassa bhagavato sakyaputtassa sirīmato
atk-s0508a11:2287_4: namo atthu, taṁ namāmīti attho. Tenāti tena bhagavatā. Ayanti tassa dhammassa attano
atk-s0508a11:2287_5: paccakkhatāya vadati. Aggappattenāti aggaṁ sabbaññutaṁ, sabbehi vā guṇehi aggabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2287_6: seṭṭhabhāvaṁ pattena. Aggadhammoti aggo uttamo navavidhalokuttaro dhammo suṭṭhu aviparītaṁ desito paveditoti.
atk-s0508a11:2290_0: Andhohaṁ hatanettosmīti āyasmato cakkhupālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2290_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a11:2290_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bhagavati parinibbute thūpamahe kayiramāne umāpupphaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2290_3: gahetvā thūpaṁ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni
atk-s0508a11:2290_4: katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ mahāsuvaṇṇassa nāma
atk-s0508a11:2290_5: kuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatti, tassa pāloti nāmamakaṁsu. Mātā tassa ādhāvitvā
atk-s0508a11:2290_6: paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle aññaṁ puttaṁ labhi. Tassa mātāpitaro cūḷapāloti nāmaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a11:2290_7: itaraṁ mahāpāloti vohariṁsu. Atha te vayappatte gharabandhanena bandhiṁsu. Tasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2290_8: samaye satthā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane. Tattha mahāpālo jetavanaṁ gacchantehi
atk-s0508a11:2290_9: upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho kuṭumbabhāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:2290_10: kaniṭṭhabhātikasseva bhāraṁ katvā sayaṁ pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado ācariyupajjhāyānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2290_11: santike pañcavassāni vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0508a11:2290_12: saṭṭhimatte sahāyabhikkhū labhitvā tehi saddhiṁ bhāvanānukūlaṁ vasanaṭṭhānaṁ pariyesanto
atk-s0508a11:2290_13: aññataraṁ paccantagāmaṁ nissāya gāmavāsikehi upāsakehi kāretvā dinnāya araññāyatane
atk-s0508a11:2290_14: paṇṇasālāya vasanto samaṇadhammaṁ karoti. Tassa akkhirogo uppanno. Vejjo bhesajjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2290_15: sampādetvā adāsi. So vejjena vuttavidhānaṁ na paṭipajji. Tenassa rogo vaḍḍhi. So
atk-s0508a11:2290_17: vipassanāyayeva yuttappayutto ahosi. Tassa bhāvanaṁ ussukkāpentassa apubbaṁ acarimaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2290_18: akkhīni ceva kilesā ca bhijjiṁsu. So sukkhavipassako arahā ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a11:2300_0: Atha there akkhirogena vihāre ohīne gāmaṁ piṇḍāya gate bhikkhū disvā upāsakā ‘‘kasmā
atk-s0508a11:2300_1: thero nāgato’’ti pucchitvā tamatthaṁ sutvā sokābhibhūtā piṇḍapātaṁ upanetvā, ‘‘bhante,
atk-s0508a11:2300_2: kiñci mā cintayittha, idāni mayameva piṇḍapātaṁ ānetvā upaṭṭhahissāmā’’ti tathā karonti.
atk-s0508a11:2300_3: Bhikkhū therassa ovāde ṭhatvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ patvā vuṭṭhavassā pavāretvā,
atk-s0508a11:2300_4: ‘‘satthāraṁ vandituṁ sāvatthiṁ gamissāma, bhante’’ti āhaṁsu. Thero, ‘‘ahaṁ dubbalo
atk-s0508a11:2300_5: acakkhuko, maggo ca saupaddavo, mayā saddhiṁ gacchantānaṁ tumhākaṁ parissayo bhavissati,
atk-s0508a11:2300_6: tumhe paṭhamaṁ gacchatha, gantvā satthāraṁ mahāthere ca mama vandanāya vandatha,
atk-s0508a11:2300_7: cūḷapālassa mama pavattiṁ kathetvā kañci purisaṁ peseyyāthā’’ti āha. Te punapi yācitvā
atk-s0508a11:2300_8: gamanaṁ alabhantā ‘‘sādhū’’ti paṭissuṇitvā senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā upāsake āpucchitvā
atk-s0508a11:2300_9: anukkamena jetavanaṁ gantvā satthāraṁ mahāthere ca tassa vandanāya vanditvā dutiyadivase
atk-s0508a11:2300_10: sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā cūḷapālassa taṁ pavattiṁ vatvā tena ‘‘ayaṁ, bhante, mayhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2300_11: bhāgineyyo pālito nāma, imaṁ pesissāmī’’ti vutte, ‘‘maggo saparissayo, na sakkā ekena
atk-s0508a11:2300_12: gahaṭṭhena gantuṁ, tasmā pabbājetabbo’’ti taṁ pabbājetvā pesesuṁ. So anukkamena therassa
atk-s0508a11:2300_13: santikaṁ gantvā attānaṁ tassa orocetvā taṁ gahetvā āgacchanto antarāmagge aññatarassa
atk-s0508a11:2300_14: gāmassa sāmantā araññaṭṭhāne ekissā kaṭṭhahāriyā gāyantiyā saddaṁ sutvā paṭibaddhacitto
atk-s0508a11:2300_15: hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṁ vissajjetvā ‘‘tiṭṭhatha, bhante, muhuttaṁ yāvāhaṁ āgacchāmī’’ti
atk-s0508a11:2300_16: vatvā tassā santikaṁ gantvā tattha sīlavipattiṁ pāpuṇi. Thero idānimeva itthiyā gītasaddo
atk-s0508a11:2300_17: suto, sāmaṇero ca cirāyati, nūna sīlavipattiṁ patto bhavissatī’’ti cintesi. Sopi
atk-s0508a11:2300_18: āgantvā ‘‘gacchāma, bhante’’ti āha. Thero ‘‘kiṁ pāpo jātosī’’ti pucchi. Sāmaṇero
atk-s0508a11:2300_19: tuṇhī hutvā puna pucchitopi na kathesi. Thero ‘‘tādisena pāpena mayhaṁ yaṭṭhigahaṇakiccaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2300_20: natthi, gaccha tva’’nti vatvā puna tena ‘‘bahuparissayo maggo, tumhe ca andhā, kathaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2300_21: gamissathā’’ti vutte ‘‘bāla idheva me nipajjitvā marantassāpi aparāparaṁ parivattentassāpi
atk-s0508a11:2300_22: tādisena gamanaṁ nāma natthī’’ti imamatthaṁ dassento –
atk-s0508a11:2303: Sayamānopi gacchissaṁ, na sahāyena pāpenā’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsittha;
atk-s0508a11:2304_0: Tattha andhoti cakkhuvikalo. Hatanettoti vinaṭṭhacakkhuko, tena ‘‘payogavipattivasenāhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2304_1: upahatanettatāya andho, na jaccandhabhāvenā’’ti yathāvuttaṁ andhabhāvaṁ viseseti.
atk-s0508a11:2304_2: Atha vā ‘‘andho’’ti idaṁ ‘‘andhe jiṇṇe mātāpitaro posetī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.288)
atk-s0508a11:2304_4: ‘‘andho ekacakkhu dvicakkhū’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 3.29) viya na paññācakkhuvekalladīpananti
atk-s0508a11:2304_5: dassetuṁ ‘‘hatanettosmī’’ti vuttaṁ, tena mukhyameva andhabhāvaṁ dasseti. Kantāraddhānapakkhandoti
atk-s0508a11:2304_6: kantāre vivane dīghamaggaṁ anupaviṭṭho, na jātikantārādigahanaṁ saṁsāraddhānaṁ paṭipannoti
atk-s0508a11:2304_7: adhippāyo. Tādisañhi kantāraddhānaṁ ayaṁ thero samatikkamitvā ṭhito, sayamānopīti
atk-s0508a11:2304_8: sayantopi, pādesu avahantesu urena jaṇṇukāhi ca bhūmiyaṁ saṁsaranto parivattentopi
atk-s0508a11:2304_9: gaccheyyaṁ. Na sahāyena pāpenāti tādisena pāpapuggalena sahāyabhūtena saddhiṁ na
atk-s0508a11:2304_10: gacchissanti yojanā. Taṁ sutvā itaro saṁvegajāto ‘‘bhāriyaṁ vata mayā sāhasikakammaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2304_11: kata’’nti bāhā paggayha kandanto vanasaṇḍaṁ pakkhando ca ahosi. Atha therassa sīlatejena
atk-s0508a11:2304_12: paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṁ uṇhākāraṁ dassesi. Tena sakko taṁ kāraṇaṁ ñatvā therassa santikaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2304_13: gantvā sāvatthigāmipurisaṁ viya attānaṁ ñāpetvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṁ gaṇhanto maggaṁ saṅkhipitvā
atk-s0508a11:2304_14: tadaheva sāyanhe sāvatthiyaṁ theraṁ netvā tattha jetavane cūḷapālitena kāritāya paṇṇasālāya
atk-s0508a11:2304_15: phalake nisīdāpetvā tassa sahāyavaṇṇena therassa āgatabhāvaṁ jānāpetvā pakkāmi; cūḷapālitopi
atk-s0508a11:2307_0: Ekapupphaṁcajitvānāti āyasmato khaṇḍasumanattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a11:2307_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthari parinibbute tassa thūpassa
atk-s0508a11:2307_2: samantato candanavedikāya parikkhipitvā mahantaṁ pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a11:2307_3: devamanussesu uḷāraṁ sampattiṁ anubhavanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kuṭumbikakule
atk-s0508a11:2307_4: nibbatto satthari parinibbute kanakathūpaṁ uddissa raññā pupphapūjāya kayiramānāya
atk-s0508a11:2307_5: pupphāni alabhanto ekaṁ khaṇḍasumanapupphaṁ disvā mahatā mūlena taṁ kiṇitvā gaṇhanto
atk-s0508a11:2307_6: cetiye pūjaṁ karonto uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ uppādesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke
atk-s0508a11:2307_7: nibbattitvā asīti vassakoṭiyo saggasukhaṁ anubhavitvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde pāvāyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2307_8: mallarājakule nibbatti. Tassa jātakāle gehe khaṇḍasakkharā sumanapupphāni ca uppannāni
atk-s0508a11:2307_9: ahesuṁ. Tenassa khaṇḍasumanoti nāmamakaṁsu. So viññutaṁ patto bhagavati pāvāyaṁ cundassa
atk-s0508a11:2307_10: ambavane viharante upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a11:2307_11: kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.15.15-20) –
atk-s0508a11:2315: Omattaṁ me na passāmi, pubbakammassidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2319: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano purimajātiṁ anussaranto tattha attano sumanapupphapariccāgassa saggasampattinimittakaṁ nibbānūpanissayatañca disvā udānavasena tamatthaṁ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a11:2322: Saggesu paricāretvā, sesakenamhi nibbuto’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2323_0: Tattha ekapupphanti ekaṁ kusumaṁ, taṁ pana idha sumanapupphaṁ adhippetaṁ. Cajitvānāti
atk-s0508a11:2323_1: satthu thūpapūjākaraṇavasena pariccajitvā pariccāgahetu. Asīti vassakoṭiyoti manussagaṇanāya
atk-s0508a11:2323_2: vassānaṁ asīti koṭiyo, accantasaṁyoge cetaṁ upayogavacanaṁ, idañca chasu kāmasaggesu
atk-s0508a11:2323_3: dutiye aparāparuppattivasena vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Tasmā saggesūti tāvatiṁsasaṅkhāte
atk-s0508a11:2323_4: saggaloke, punappunaṁ uppajjanavasena hettha bahuvacanaṁ. Paricāretvāti rūpādīsu
atk-s0508a11:2323_5: ārammaṇesu indriyāni paricāretvā sukhaṁ anubhavitvā, devaccharāhi vā attānaṁ paricāretvā
atk-s0508a11:2323_6: upaṭṭhāpetvā. Sesakenamhi nibbutoti pupphapūjāya vasena pavattakusalacetanāsu bhavasampatti
atk-s0508a11:2323_7: dāyakakammato sesena yaṁ tattha vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṁ, taṁ sandhāya vadati. Bahū
atk-s0508a11:2323_8: hi tattha pubbāparavasena pavattā cetanā. Sesakenāti vā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena
atk-s0508a11:2323_9: aparikkhīṇeyeva tasmiṁ kammavipāke nibbuto amhi, kilesaparinibbānena parinibbutosmi.
atk-s0508a11:2323_10: Etena yasmiṁ attabhāve ṭhatvā attanā arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ, sopi carimattabhāvo tassa
atk-s0508a11:2323_11: kammavipākoti dasseti. Yādisaṁ sandhāya aññatthāpi ‘‘tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:2326_0: Hitvā satapalaṁ kaṁsanti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2326_1: katādhikāro vipassissa bhagavato kāle yānakārakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2326_2: bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso candanakhaṇḍena phalakaṁ katvā bhagavato upanāmesi,
atk-s0508a11:2326_3: tañca bhagavā paribhuñji. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni
atk-s0508a11:2326_4: katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde roruvanagare rājakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a11:2326_5: So vayappatto pitari kālaṅkate rajje patiṭṭhito bimbisārarañño adiṭṭhasahāyo hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2326_6: tassa maṇimuttāvatthādīni paṇṇākārāni pesesi. Tassa rājā bimbisāro puññavantataṁ
atk-s0508a11:2326_7: sutvā paṭipābhataṁ pesento cittapaṭe buddhacaritaṁ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe ca paṭiccasamuppādaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2326_8: likhāpetvā pesesi. So taṁ disvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya pacchimabhavikatāya
atk-s0508a11:2326_9: ca cittapaṭe dassentaṁ buddhacaritaṁ suvaṇṇapaṭṭake likhitaṁ paṭiccasamuppādakkamañca
atk-s0508a11:2326_10: oloketvā pavattinivattiyo sallakkhetvā sāsanakkamaṁ hadaye ṭhapetvā sañjātasaṁvego
atk-s0508a11:2326_11: ‘‘diṭṭho mayā bhagavato veso, sāsanakkamo ca ekapadesena ñāto, bahudukkhā kāmā bahupāyāsā,
atk-s0508a11:2326_12: kiṁ dāni mayhaṁ gharāvāsenā’’ti rajjaṁ pahāya kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni
atk-s0508a11:2326_13: acchādento bhagavantaṁ uddissa pabbajitvā mattikāpattaṁ gahetvā rājā pukkusāti viya
atk-s0508a11:2326_14: mahājanassa paridevantasseva nagarato nikkhamitvā anukkamena rājagahaṁ gantvā tattha
atk-s0508a11:2326_15: sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre viharantaṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a11:2326_16: Satthā dhammaṁ desesi. So dhammadesanaṁ sutvā vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā yuttappayutto
atk-s0508a11:2326_17: viharanto vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.15.37-42) –
atk-s0508a11:2332: Akkhubbhaṁ ratanaṁ mayhaṁ, phalakassa idaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2338: Arahattaṁ pana patvā udānavasena attano paṭipattiṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a11:2341: Aggahiṁ mattikāpattaṁ, idaṁ dutiyābhisecana’’nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2342_0: Tattha hitvāti pariccajitvā. Satapalanti sataṁ palāni yassa, taṁ satapalaparimāṇaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2342_1: Kaṁsanti thālaṁ. Sovaṇṇanti suvaṇṇamayaṁ. Satarājikanti bhittivicittatāya ca anekarūparājicittatāya
atk-s0508a11:2342_2: ca anekalekhāyuttaṁ. Aggahiṁ mattikāpattanti evarūpe mahārahe bhājane pubbe bhuñjitvā
atk-s0508a11:2342_3: buddhānaṁ ovādaṁ karonto ‘‘idānāhaṁ taṁ chaḍḍetvā mattikāmayapattaṁ aggahesiṁ , aho,
atk-s0508a11:2342_4: sādhu, mayā kataṁ ariyavataṁ anuṭhita’’nti bhājanakittanāpadesena rajjapariccāgaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2342_5: pabbajjūpagamanañca anumodanto vadati. Tenāha ‘‘idaṁ dutiyābhisecana’’nti. Paṭhamaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2342_6: rajjābhisecanaṁ upādāya idaṁ pabbajjūpagamanaṁ mama dutiyaṁ abhisecanaṁ. Tañhi rāgādīhi
atk-s0508a11:2342_7: saṁkiliṭṭhaṁ sāsaṅkaṁ saparisaṅkaṁ kammaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ dukkhapaṭibaddhaṁ nihīnaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2342_8: idaṁ pana taṁvipariyāyato uttamaṁ paṇītanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:2345_0: Rūpaṁ disvā sati muṭṭhāti āyasmato abhayattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Sopi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2345_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:2345_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sumedhaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a11:2345_3: saḷalapupphehi pūjamakāsi. So tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni
atk-s0508a11:2345_4: katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a11:2345_5: abhayoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno ekadivasaṁ vihāraṁ gato
atk-s0508a11:2345_6: satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya
atk-s0508a11:2345_7: kammaṁ karonto viharati. Athassa ekadivasaṁ gāmaṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2345_8: mātugāmaṁ disvā ayonisomanasikāravasena tassa rūpaṁ ārabbha chandarāgo uppajji, so
atk-s0508a11:2345_9: vihāraṁ pavisitvā ‘‘satiṁ vissajjitvā olokentassa rūpārammaṇe mayhaṁ kileso uppanno,
atk-s0508a11:2345_10: ayuttaṁ mayā kata’’nti attano cittaṁ niggaṇhanto tāvadeva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2355: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano kilesuppattinidassanena ‘‘kilese anuvattentassa vaṭṭadukkhato nattheva sīsukkhipanaṁ. Ahaṁ pana te nānuvatti’’nti dassento –
atk-s0508a11:2357: ‘‘Rūpaṁ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto;
atk-s0508a11:2359: Tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, bhavamūlopagāmino’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2360_0: Tattha rūpanti rajjanīyaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ, taṁ panettha itthirūpaṁ adhippetaṁ. Disvāti
atk-s0508a11:2360_1: cakkhunā disvā, cakkhudvārānusārena nimittānubyañjanasallakkhaṇavasena taṁ gahetvā,
atk-s0508a11:2360_2: tassa tathāgahaṇahetūti attho. Sati muṭṭhāti asubhasabhāve kāye ‘‘asubha’’ntveva
atk-s0508a11:2360_3: pavattanasati naṭṭhā. Yathā pana rūpaṁ disvā sati naṭṭhā, taṁ dassento āha ‘‘piyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2360_4: nimittaṁ manasikaroto’’ti. Yathāupaṭṭhitaṁ ārammaṇaṁ ‘‘subhaṁ sukha’’ntiādinā piyanimittaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2360_5: katvā ayonisomanasikārena manasikaroto sati muṭṭhāti yojanā. Tathā bhūtova sārattacitto
atk-s0508a11:2360_6: vedetīti suṭṭhu rattacitto hutvā taṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ anubhavati abhinandati, abhinandanto
atk-s0508a11:2360_7: pana tañca ajjhosa tiṭṭhati ajjhosāya taṁ ārammaṇaṁ gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā vattati
atk-s0508a11:2360_8: ceva, evaṁbhūtassa ca tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā bhavamūlopagāminoti bhavassa saṁsārassa
atk-s0508a11:2360_9: mūlabhāvaṁ kāraṇabhāvaṁ upagamanasabhāvā kāmāsavādayo cattāropi āsavā tassa puggalassa
atk-s0508a11:2360_10: uparūpari vaḍḍhantiyeva, na hāyanti. Mayhaṁ pana paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhatvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a11:2360_11: saccāni paṭivijjhantassa maggapaṭipāṭiyā te cattāropi āsavā anavasesato pahīnā parikkhīṇāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:2363_0: Saddaṁsutvā sati muṭṭhāti āyasmato uttiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2363_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:2363_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a11:2363_3: gonakādiatthataṁ sauttaracchadaṁ buddhārahaṁ pallaṅkaṁ gandhakuṭiyaṁ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2363_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2363_5: sakyarājakule nibbatti, tassa uttiyoti nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame
atk-s0508a11:2363_6: buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karonto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2363_7: nāmaṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho antarāmagge mātugāmassa gītasaddaṁ sutvā ayonisomanasikāravasena
atk-s0508a11:2363_8: tattha chandarāge uppanne paṭisaṅkhānabalena taṁ vikkhambhetvā vihāraṁ pavisitvā
atk-s0508a11:2363_9: sañjātasaṁvego divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā tāvadeva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2373: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano kilesuppattinidassanena ‘‘kilese ajigucchantassa natthi vaṭṭadukkhato sīsukkhipanaṁ, ahaṁ pana te jigucchimevā’’ti dassento –
atk-s0508a11:2375: ‘‘Saddaṁ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto;
atk-s0508a11:2377: Tassa vaḍḍhanti āsavā, saṁsāra upagāmino’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2381: Evaṁ vuttasaṁsāravaṭṭakāraṇaṁ hutvā upagamentīti saṁsāraupagāmino, ‘‘saṁsārūpagāmino’’ti vā pāṭho. Sesaṁ anantaragāthāya vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a11:2384_0: Sammappadhānasampannoti āyasmato devasabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2384_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:2384_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sikhiṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2384_3: bandhujīvakapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2384_4: buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṁ sakyarājakule nibbatti, tassa devasabhoti nāmaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2384_5: So vayappatto cumbaṭakalahavūpasamanatthaṁ satthari āgate buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2384_6: saraṇesu patiṭṭhito puna nigrodhārāme satthari viharante satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a11:2384_7: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a11:2384_8: arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.16.1-6) –
atk-s0508a11:2396: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attanā adhigataṁ vimuttisukhaṁ nissāya uppannapītisomanasso udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:2400_1: sampādetvā ṭhitoti attho. Satipaṭṭhānagocaroti kāyānupassanādayo satipaṭṭhānā gocaro
atk-s0508a11:2400_2: pavattiṭṭhānaṁ etassāti satipaṭṭhānagocaro, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu patiṭṭhitacittoti
atk-s0508a11:2400_3: attho. Guṇasobhena paramasugandhā vimuttiyeva kusumāni, tehi sabbaso sammadeva sañchanno
atk-s0508a11:2400_4: vibhūsito alaṅkatoti vimuttikusumasañchanno. Parinibbissatyanāsavoti evaṁ sammā paṭipajjanto
atk-s0508a11:2400_5: bhikkhu nacirasseva anāsavo hutvā parinibbissati saupādisesāya anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyāti
atk-s0508a11:2400_6: attho. Idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2405_0: Hitvāgihittaṁ anavositattotiādikā āyasmato belaṭṭhānikattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a11:2405_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito ekatiṁse kappe vessabhussa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a11:2405_2: nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṁ gantvā gharāvāsaṁ pahāya isipabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2405_3: pabbajitvā isīhi parivuto vicaranto ekadivasaṁ vessabhuṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pītisomanassajāto
atk-s0508a11:2405_4: satthu ñāṇasampattiṁ nissāya pasannamānaso ñāṇaṁ uddissa pupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi. So
atk-s0508a11:2405_5: tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a11:2405_6: nibbattitvā belaṭṭhānikoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:2405_7: pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā kosalaraṭṭhe araññe viharanto alaso kāyadaḷhibahulo
atk-s0508a11:2405_8: pharusavāco ahosi, samaṇadhamme cittaṁ na uppādesi. Atha naṁ bhagavā ñāṇaparipākaṁ oloketvā –
atk-s0508a11:2409_0: Imāya obhāsagāthāya saṁvejesi. So satthāraṁ purato nisinnaṁ viya disvā tañca gāthaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2409_1: sutvā saṁvegajāto ñāṇassa paripākaṁ gatattā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2411: Obhāsentaṁ disā sabbā, osadhiṁ viya tārakaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2421: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthu ovādaṁ paṭipūjento byatirekamukhena ca aññaṁ byākaronto tameva gāthaṁ paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2422_0: Tattha hitvā gihittanti gahaṭṭhabhāvaṁ pariccajitvā pabbajitvāti attho. Anavositattoti
atk-s0508a11:2422_1: anurūpaṁ avositatto, yadatthaṁ sāsane pabbajantassa anurūpapariññādīnaṁ atīritattā
atk-s0508a11:2422_2: apariyositabhāvo akatakaraṇīyoti attho. Atha vā anavositattoti anuavositasabhāvo,
atk-s0508a11:2422_3: visuddhīnaṁ maggānañca anupaṭipāṭiyā vasitabbavāsassa akatāvī, dasasu ariyavāsesu
atk-s0508a11:2422_4: avusitavāti attho. Mukhasaṅkhātaṁ naṅgalaṁ imassa atthīti mukhanaṅgalī. Naṅgalena
atk-s0508a11:2422_5: viya pathaviṁ paresu pharusavācappayogena attānaṁ khanantoti attho. Odarikoti udare
atk-s0508a11:2422_6: pasuto udaraposanatapparo. Kusītoti alaso, bhāvanaṁ ananuyuñjanto. Evaṁbhūtassa nipphattiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2422_7: dassento āha ‘‘mahāvarāhova nivāpapuṭṭho, punappunaṁ gabbhamupeti mando’’ti. Tassattho
atk-s0508a11:2422_8: heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Ettha ca yathā pabbajitvā anavositādisabhāvatāya punappunaṁ gabbhamupeti
atk-s0508a11:2422_9: mando, na evaṁ mādiso paṇḍito. Tabbiparītasabhāvatāya pana sammāpaṭipattiyā matthakaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2422_10: pāpitattā parinibbāyatīti byatirekamukhena aññaṁ byākāsīti daṭṭhabbanti.
atk-s0508a11:2425_0: Mānenavañcitāseti āyasmato setucchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2425_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto tissassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0508a11:2425_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ tissaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2425_3: sumadhuraṁ panasaphalaṁ abhisaṅkhataṁ nāḷikerasāḷavaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a11:2425_4: devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde aññatarassa
atk-s0508a11:2425_5: maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatti, setucchotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So pitari mate rajje
atk-s0508a11:2425_6: patiṭṭhito ussāhasattīnaṁ abhāvena rājakiccāni virādhento rajjaṁ parahatthagataṁ
atk-s0508a11:2425_7: katvā dukkhappattiyā saṁvegajāto janapadacārikaṁ carantaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a11:2425_8: dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā parikammaṁ karonto tadaheva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2438: Lābhālābhena mathitā, samādhiṁ nādhigacchantī’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2439_2: cakkhādīsu ceva rūpādīsu ca saṅkhatadhammesu saṁkilissamānā, ‘‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi,
atk-s0508a11:2439_3: eso me attā’’ti taṁnimittaṁ taṇhāgāhādivasena saṁkilesaṁ āpajjamānā. Lābhālābhena
atk-s0508a11:2439_4: mathitāti pattacīvarādīnañceva vatthādīnañca lābhena tesaṁyeva ca alābhena taṁnimittaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2439_5: uppannehi anunayapaṭighehi mathitā madditā abhibhūtā. Nidassanamattañcetaṁ avasiṭṭhalokadhammānampettha
atk-s0508a11:2439_6: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Samādhiṁ nādhigacchantīti te evarūpā puggalā samādhiṁ samathavipassanāvasena
atk-s0508a11:2439_7: cittekaggataṁ kadācipi na vindanti na paṭilabhanti na pāpuṇanti samādhisaṁvattanikānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2439_8: dhammānaṁ abhāvato, itaresañca bhāvato. Idhāpi yathā mānādīhi abhibhūtā aviddasuno
atk-s0508a11:2439_9: samādhiṁ nādhigacchanti, na evaṁ viddasuno. Te pana mādisā tehi anabhibhūtā samādhiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2442_0: Nāhaṁ etena atthikoti āyasmato bandhurattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2442_1: katādhikāro siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle aññatarassa rañño antepure gopako hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2442_2: ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ saparisaṁ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṁ disvā pasannacitto kaṇaverapupphāni
atk-s0508a11:2442_3: gahetvā sasaṅghaṁ lokanāyakaṁ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2442_4: sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sīlavatīnagare seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2442_5: bandhurotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena sāvatthiyaṁ gato
atk-s0508a11:2442_6: upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gato satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:2442_7: ñāṇassa paripākattā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2448: Buddhassa visuṁ katvāna, tato bhiyyo samokiriṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2454_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā kataññubhāve ṭhatvā attano upakārassa rañño paccupakāraṁ kātuṁ
atk-s0508a11:2454_1: sīlavatīnagaraṁ gantvā rañño dhammaṁ desento saccāni pakāsesi. Rājā saccapariyosāne
atk-s0508a11:2454_2: sotāpanno hutvā attano nagare sudassanaṁ nāma mahantaṁ vihāraṁ kāretvā therassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0508a11:2454_3: Mahālābhasakkāro ahosi. Thero vihāraṁ sabbañca lābhasakkāraṁ saṅghassa niyyātetvā
atk-s0508a11:2454_4: sayaṁ purimaniyāmeneva piṇḍāya caritvā yāpento katipāhaṁ tattha vasitvā sāvatthiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2454_5: gantukāmo ahosi. Bhikkhū, ‘‘bhante, tumhe idheva vasatha, sace paccayehi vekallaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2454_6: mayaṁ taṁ paripūressāmā’’ti āhaṁsu. Thero, ‘‘na mayhaṁ, āvuso, uḷārehi paccayehi
atk-s0508a11:2454_7: attho atthi, itarītarehi paccayehi yāpemi, dhammarasenevamhi titto’’ti dassento –
atk-s0508a11:2457: Pitvā rasaggamuttamaṁ, na ca kāhāmi visena santhava’’nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2459_0: Tattha nāhaṁ etena atthikoti yena maṁ tumhe tappetukāmā ‘‘paripūressāmā’’ti vadatha,
atk-s0508a11:2459_1: etena āmisalābhena paccayāmisarasena nāhaṁ atthiko, mayhaṁ etena attho natthi, santuṭṭhi
atk-s0508a11:2459_2: paramaṁ sukhanti itarītareheva paccayehi yāpemīti attho. Idāni tena anatthikabhāve
atk-s0508a11:2459_3: padhānakāraṇaṁ dassento āha ‘‘sukhito dhammarasena tappito’’ti. Sattatiṁsabodhipakkhiyadhammarasena
atk-s0508a11:2459_4: ceva navavidhalokuttaradhammarasena ca tappito pīṇito sukhito uttamena sukhena suhitoti
atk-s0508a11:2459_5: attho. Pitvā rasaggamuttamanti sabbarasesu aggaṁ seṭṭhaṁ tatoyeva uttamaṁ yathāvuttaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2459_6: dhammarasaṁ pivitvā ṭhito, tenāha – ‘‘sabbarasaṁ dhammaraso jinātī’’ti (dha. pa.
atk-s0508a11:2459_7: 354). Na ca kāhāmi visena santhavanti evarūpaṁ rasuttamaṁ dhammarasaṁ pivitvā ṭhito
atk-s0508a11:2459_8: visena visasadisena visarasena santhavaṁ saṁsaggaṁ na karissāmi, tathākaraṇassa kāraṇaṁ natthīti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2462_0: Lahukovata me kāyoti āyasmato khitakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2462_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a11:2462_2: yakkhasenāpati hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṁ yakkhasamāgame nisinno satthāraṁ aññatarasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2462_3: rukkhamūle nisinnaṁ disvā upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Tassa
atk-s0508a11:2462_4: satthā dhammaṁ desesi. So dhammaṁ sutvā uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ pavedento apphoṭento
atk-s0508a11:2462_5: uṭṭhahitvā satthāraṁ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:2462_6: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, khitakotissa nāmaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2462_7: ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto mahāmoggallānattherassa mahiddhikabhāvaṁ sutvā ‘‘iddhimā
atk-s0508a11:2462_8: bhavissāmī’’ti pubbahetunā codiyamāno pabbajitvā bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0508a11:2462_9: samathavipassanāsu kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a11:2474_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā savisesaṁ iddhīsu vasībhāvena anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhonto
atk-s0508a11:2474_1: iddhipāṭihāriyena anusāsanīpāṭihāriyena ca sattānaṁ anuggahaṁ karonto viharati. So
atk-s0508a11:2474_2: bhikkhūhi, ‘‘kathaṁ tvaṁ, āvuso, iddhi vaḷañjesī’’ti puṭṭho tamatthaṁ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a11:2476: ‘‘Lahuko vata me kāyo, phuṭṭho ca pītisukhena vipulena;
atk-s0508a11:2477: Tūlamiva eritaṁ mālutena, pilavatīva me kāyo’’ti. –
atk-s0508a11:2479_0: Tattha lahuko vata me kāyoti nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanena cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena
atk-s0508a11:2479_1: caturiddhipādakabhāvanāya suṭṭhu ciṇṇavasībhāvena ca me rūpakāyo sallahuko vata,
atk-s0508a11:2479_2: yena dandhaṁ mahābhūtapaccayampi nāma imaṁ karajakāyaṁ cittavasena pariṇāmemīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:2479_3: Phuṭṭho ca pītisukhenavipulenāti sabbatthakameva pharantena mahatā uḷārena pītisahitena
atk-s0508a11:2479_4: sukhena phuṭṭho ca me kāyoti yojanā. Idañca yathā kāyo lahuko ahosi, taṁ dassanatthaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2479_5: vuttaṁ. Sukhasaññokkamanena hi saddhiṁyeva lahusaññokkamanaṁ hoti. Sukhassa pharaṇañcettha
atk-s0508a11:2479_6: taṁsamuṭṭhānarūpavasena daṭṭhabbaṁ kathaṁ pana catutthajjhānasamaṅgino pītisukhapharaṇaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2479_7: samatikkantapītisukhañhi tanti ce? Saccametaṁ, idaṁ pana na catutthajjhānalakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0508a11:2479_8: vuttaṁ, atha kho pubbabhāgavasena. ‘‘Pītisukhenā’’ti pana pītisahitasadisena sukhena,
atk-s0508a11:2479_9: upekkhā hi idha santasabhāvatāya ñāṇavisesayogato ca sukhanti adhippetaṁ. Tathā hi
atk-s0508a11:2479_11: rūpakāyārammaṇena vā iddhicittena sahajātaṁ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamati pavisati
atk-s0508a11:2479_12: phusati sampāpuṇātīti ayampi tattha attho. Tathā cāha aṭṭhakathāyaṁ (paṭi. ma. aṭṭha.
atk-s0508a11:2479_13: 2.3.12) – ‘‘sukhasaññā nāma upekkhāsampayuttā saññā. Upekkhā hi santaṁ sukhanti vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2479_14: sāyeva saññā nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādipaccanīkehi ca vimuttattā lahusaññātipi veditabbā.
atk-s0508a11:2479_15: Taṁ okkantassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu viya sallahuko hoti. So evaṁ vātakkhittatūlapicuno
atk-s0508a11:2479_16: viya sallahukena dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchatī’’ti. Tenāha ‘‘tūlamiva eritaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2479_17: mālutena, pilavatīva me kāyo’’ti. Tassattho – yadāhaṁ brahmalokaṁ aññaṁ vā iddhiyā
atk-s0508a11:2479_18: gantukāmo homi, tadā mālutena vāyunā eritaṁ cittaṁ tūlapicu viya ākāsaṁ laṅghantoyeva me kāyo hotīti.
atk-s0508a11:2482_0: Ukkaṇṭhitoti āyasmato malitavambhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a11:2482_1: bhagavato kāle himavantato avidūre aññatarasmiṁ jātassare sakuṇo hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2482_2: padumuttaro bhagavā taṁ anuggaṇhanto tattha gantvā jātassaratīre caṅkamati. Sakuṇo
atk-s0508a11:2482_3: bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso sare kumudāni gahetvā bhagavantaṁ pūjesi. So tena
atk-s0508a11:2482_4: puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kurukacchanagare aññatarassa
atk-s0508a11:2482_5: brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, malitavambhotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto
atk-s0508a11:2482_6: pacchābhūmahātheraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:2482_7: vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto viharati. Tassa ca ayaṁ sabhāvo, yattha bhojanasappāyo
atk-s0508a11:2482_8: dullabho, itare sulabhā, tato na pakkamati. Yattha pana bhojanasappāyo sulabho, itare
atk-s0508a11:2482_9: dullabhā, tattha na vasati pakkamateva. Evaṁ viharanto ca hetusampannatāya mahāpurisajātikatāya
atk-s0508a11:2482_10: ca nacirasseva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.16.51-57) –
atk-s0508a11:2496: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā udānento –
atk-s0508a11:2499: Na tvevānatthasaṁhitaṁ, vase vāsaṁ vicakkhaṇo’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2500_0: Tattha ukkaṇṭhitopi na vaseti yasmiṁ āvāse vasantassa me bhojanasappāyālābhena adhikusalesu
atk-s0508a11:2500_1: dhammesu ukkaṇṭhā anabhirati uppajjati, tattha ukkaṇṭhitopi vasāmiyeva itarasappāyalābhena
atk-s0508a11:2500_2: na pakkame na pakkamāmi. Na vaseti ettha na-kārenapi pakkametipadaṁ sambandhitabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2500_3: Ramamānopi pakkameti yasmiṁ pana āvāse vasantassa me paccayavekallābhāvena natthi
atk-s0508a11:2500_4: ukkaṇṭhā, aññadatthu abhiramāmi, evaṁ abhiramamānopi avasesasappāyālābhena tato pakkame,
atk-s0508a11:2500_5: na vaseyyaṁ. Evaṁ paṭipajjantovāhaṁ nacirasseva sakatthaṁ paccupādinti. Ayañcettha
atk-s0508a11:2500_6: attapaṭipattipaccavekkhaṇāyaṁ yojanā. Parassa ovādadāne pana vaseyya na pakkameyyāti
atk-s0508a11:2500_7: vidhānavasena yojetabbaṁ. Na tvevānatthasaṁhitaṁ, vase vāsaṁ vicakkhaṇoti yasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2500_8: āvāse paccayā sulabhā , samaṇadhammo na pāripūriṁ gacchati, yasmiñca āvāse paccayā
atk-s0508a11:2500_9: dullabhā, samaṇadhammopi pāripūriṁ na gacchati, evarūpo āvāso idha anatthasaṁhito
atk-s0508a11:2500_10: nāma avaḍḍhisahitoti katvā. Evarūpaṁ vāsaṁ vicakkhaṇo viññujātiko sakatthaṁ paripūretukāmo
atk-s0508a11:2500_11: natveva vaseyya. Yattha pana pañcaṅgasamannāgato āvāso labbhati, sattapi sappāyā
atk-s0508a11:2503_0: Sataliṅgassa atthassāti āyasmato suhemantattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2503_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto ito dvānavute
atk-s0508a11:2503_2: kappe tissassa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā vane vasati, taṁ anuggahituṁ bhagavā
atk-s0508a11:2503_3: araññaṁ pavisitvā tassa āsanne ṭhāne aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisīdi. So bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2503_4: disvā pasannacitto sugandhāni punnāgapupphāni ocinitvā bhagavantaṁ pūjesi. So tena
atk-s0508a11:2503_5: puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a11:2503_6: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde pāriyantadese vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2503_7: suhemantotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto saṅkassanagare migadāye viharantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2503_8: bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā tepiṭako hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2503_9: vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāpatto ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2513_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā evaṁ cintesi – ‘‘mayā kho yaṁ sāvakena pattabbaṁ, taṁ anuppattaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2513_1: yaṁnūnāhaṁ idāni bhikkhūnaṁ anuggahaṁ kareyya’’nti. Evaṁ cintetvā pabhinnapaṭisambhidatāya
atk-s0508a11:2513_2: akilāsutāya ca attano santikaṁ upagate bhikkhū yathārahaṁ ovadanto anusāsanto kaṅkhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2513_3: chindanto dhammaṁ kathento kammaṭṭhānaṁ niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā ācikkhanto viharati.
atk-s0508a11:2513_4: Athekadivasaṁ attano santikaṁ upagatānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ viññūnañca puggalānaṁ visesaṁ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a11:2516: Ekaṅgadassī dummedho, satadassī ca paṇḍito’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2517_0: Tattha sataliṅgassāti līnamatthaṁ gamentīti liṅgāni, atthesu saddassa pavattinimittāni,
atk-s0508a11:2517_1: tāni pana sataṁ anekāni liṅgāni etassāti sataliṅgo. Anekattho hi idha satasaddo,
atk-s0508a11:2517_2: ‘‘sataṁ sahassa’’ntiādīsu viya na saṅkhyāvisesattho tassa sataliṅgassa. Atthassāti
atk-s0508a11:2517_3: ñeyyassa, ñeyyañhi ñāṇena araṇīyato ‘‘attho’’ti vuccati. So ca ekopi anekaliṅgo,
atk-s0508a11:2517_4: yathā ‘‘sakko purindado maghavā’’ti, ‘‘paññā vijjā medhā ñāṇa’’nti ca. Yena liṅgena
atk-s0508a11:2517_5: pavattinimittena tāvatiṁsādhipatimhi indasaddo pavatto, na tena tattha sakkādisaddā
atk-s0508a11:2517_6: pavattā, atha kho aññena. Tathā yena sammādiṭṭhimhi paññāsaddo pavatto, na tena vijjādisaddā.
atk-s0508a11:2518_0: Satalakkhaṇadhārinoti anekalakkhaṇavato. Lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṁ, paccayabhāvino
atk-s0508a11:2518_1: atthassa attano phalaṁ paṭicca paccayabhāvo, tena hi so ayaṁ imassa kāraṇanti lakkhīyati.
atk-s0508a11:2518_2: So ca ekasseva atthassa anekappabhedo upalabbhati , tenāha ‘‘satalakkhaṇadhārino’’ti.
atk-s0508a11:2518_3: Atha vā lakkhīyantīti lakkhaṇāni, tassa tassa atthassa saṅkhatatādayo pakāravisesā
atk-s0508a11:2518_4: te pana atthato avatthāvisesā veditabbā. Te ca pana tesaṁ aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2518_5: liṅgenti ñāpentīti ‘‘liṅgānī’’ti ca vuccanti. Tassime ākārā, yasmā ekassāpi atthassa
atk-s0508a11:2518_6: aneke upalabbhanti. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘sataliṅgassa atthassa, satalakkhaṇadhārino’’ti.
atk-s0508a11:2518_7: Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati – ‘‘sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe
atk-s0508a11:2518_8: āpāthaṁ āgacchantī’’ti (mahāni. 156; cūḷani. mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85; paṭi. ma. 3.5).
atk-s0508a11:2519_0: Ekaṅgadassī dummedhoti evaṁ anekaliṅge anekalakkhaṇe atthe yo tattha ekaṅgadassī
atk-s0508a11:2519_1: aputhupaññatāya ekaliṅgamattaṁ ekalakkhaṇamattañca disvā attanā diṭṭhameva ‘‘idameva
atk-s0508a11:2519_3: viya ekaṅgagāhī dummedho duppañño tattha vijjamānānaṁyeva pakāravisesānaṁ ajānanato
atk-s0508a11:2519_4: micchā abhinivisanato ca. Satadassī ca paṇḍitoti paṇḍito pana tattha vijjamāne anekepi
atk-s0508a11:2519_5: pakāre attano paññācakkhunā sabbaso passati. Yo vā tattha labbhamāne aneke paññācakkhunā
atk-s0508a11:2519_6: attanāpi passati, aññesampi dasseti pakāseti, so paṇḍito vicakkhaṇo atthesu kusalo
atk-s0508a11:2519_7: nāmāti. Evaṁ thero ukkaṁsagataṁ attano paṭisambhidāsampattiṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vibhāvesi.
atk-s0508a11:2522_0: Pabbajiṁtulayitvānāti āyasmato dhammasavattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a11:2522_1: bhagavato kāle suvaccho nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū gharāvāse dosaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2522_2: disvā tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññāyatane pabbatantare assamaṁ kāretvā bahūhi
atk-s0508a11:2522_3: tāpasehi saddhiṁ vasi. Athassa kusalabījaṁ ropetukāmo padumuttaro bhagavā assamasamīpe
atk-s0508a11:2522_4: ākāse ṭhatvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ dassesi. So taṁ disvā pasannamānaso pūjetukāmo nāgapupphāni
atk-s0508a11:2522_5: ocināpesi. Satthā, ‘‘alaṁ imassa tāpasassa ettakaṁ kusalabīja’’nti pakkāmi. So pupphāni
atk-s0508a11:2522_6: gahetvā satthu gamanamaggaṁ okiritvā cittaṁ pasādento añjaliṁ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. So
atk-s0508a11:2522_7: tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2522_8: buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā dhammasavoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2522_9: patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno gharāvāse ādīnavaṁ pabbajjāya ānisaṁsañca disvā dakkhiṇāgirismiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2522_10: viharantaṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a11:2522_11: kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.16.39-45) –
atk-s0508a11:2536: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā somanassappatto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:2539: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana’’nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2540_0: Tattha pabbajiṁ tulayitvānāti ‘‘sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.191;
atk-s0508a11:2540_1: ma. ni. 2.10; saṁ. ni. 2.154) gharāvāse, ‘‘appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā’’tiādinā
atk-s0508a11:2540_2: (pāci. 417; ma. ni. 1.177) kāmesu ādīnavaṁ tappaṭipakkhato nekkhamme ca ānisaṁsaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2540_3: tulabhūtāya paññāya vicāretvā vīmaṁsitvāti attho. Sesaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Idameva
atk-s0508a11:2543_0: Sa vīsavassasatikoti āyasmato dhammasavapituttherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2543_1: katādhikāro buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bhūtagaṇe nāma pabbate
atk-s0508a11:2543_2: viharantaṁ paccekasambuddhaṁ disvā pasannamānaso tiṇasūlapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi. So
atk-s0508a11:2543_3: tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2543_4: buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto dārapariggahaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2543_5: katvā dhammasavaṁ nāma puttaṁ labhitvā tasmiṁ pabbajite sayampi vīsavassasatiko hutvā,
atk-s0508a11:2543_6: ‘‘mama putto tāva taruṇo pabbaji , atha kasmā nāhaṁ pabbajissāmī’’ti sañjātasaṁvego
atk-s0508a11:2543_7: satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a11:2543_8: arahattaṁ sacchākāsi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.16.35-38) –
atk-s0508a11:2551: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānento –
atk-s0508a11:2554: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana’’nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2555_0: Tattha sa vīsavassasatikoti so vīsaṁvassasatiko, so ahaṁ jātiyā vīsādhikavassasatiko
atk-s0508a11:2555_1: samāno. Pabbajinti pabbajjaṁ upagacchiṁ. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva. Idameva ca imassa therassa
atk-s0508a11:2558_0: Na nūnāyaṁ paramahitānukampinoti āyasmato saṅgharakkhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a11:2558_1: Sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a11:2558_2: kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ pabbatapāde vasante satta paccekasambuddhe
atk-s0508a11:2558_3: disvā pasannamānaso kadambapupphāni gahetvā pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devaloke
atk-s0508a11:2558_4: nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2558_5: sāvatthiyaṁ ibbhakule nibbatti, tassa saṅgharakkhitoti nāmaṁ ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto
atk-s0508a11:2558_6: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ sahāyaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a11:2558_7: araññe viharati. Therassa vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre vanagumbe ekā migī vijāyitvā taruṇaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2558_8: chāpaṁ rakkhantī chātajjhattāpi puttasinehena dūre gocarāya na gacchati, āsanne ca
atk-s0508a11:2558_9: tiṇodakassa alābhena kilamati. Taṁ disvā thero, ‘‘aho vatāyaṁ loko taṇhābandhanabaddho
atk-s0508a11:2558_10: mahādukkhaṁ anubhavati, na taṁ chindituṁ sakkotī’’ti saṁvegajāto tameva aṅkusaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a11:2558_11: vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.16.30-34) –
atk-s0508a11:2560: Tamhi pabbatapādamhi, satta buddhā vasanti te.
atk-s0508a11:2562: Ubho hatthehi paggayha, satta buddhe samokiriṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2568: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano dutiyakaṁ bhikkhuṁ micchāvitakkabahulaṁ viharantaṁ ñatvā tameva migiṁ upamaṁ karitvā taṁ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a11:2571: Tathāhayaṁ viharati pākatindriyo, migī yathā taruṇajātikā vane’’ti. –
atk-s0508a11:2573_0: Tattha na nūnāyanti na-iti paṭisedhe nipāto. Nūnāti parivitakke. Nūna ayanti padacchedo.
atk-s0508a11:2573_1: Paramahitānukampinoti paramaṁ ativiya, paramena vā anuttarena hitena satte anukampanasīlassa
atk-s0508a11:2573_2: bhagavato. Rahogatoti rahasi gato, suññāgāragato kāyavivekayuttoti attho. Anuvigaṇetīti
atk-s0508a11:2573_3: ettha ‘‘na nūnā’’ti padadvayaṁ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ ‘‘nānuvigaṇeti nūnā’’ti, na
atk-s0508a11:2573_4: cintesi maññe, ‘‘nānuyuñjatī’’ti takkemīti attho. Sāsananti paṭipattisāsanaṁ, catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvananti
atk-s0508a11:2573_5: adhippāyo . Tathā hīti teneva kāraṇena, satthu sāsanassa ananuyuñjanato eva. Ayanti
atk-s0508a11:2573_6: ayaṁ bhikkhu. Pākatindriyoti manacchaṭṭhānaṁ indriyānaṁ yathāsakaṁ visayesu vissajjanato
atk-s0508a11:2573_7: sabhāvabhūtaindriyo , asaṁvutacakkhudvārādikoti attho. Yassa taṇhāsaṅgassa acchinnatāya
atk-s0508a11:2573_8: so bhikkhu pākatindriyo viharati, tassa upamaṁ dassento ‘‘migī yathā taruṇajātikā
atk-s0508a11:2573_9: vane’’ti āha. Yathā ayaṁ taruṇasabhāvā migī puttasnehassa acchinnatāya vane dukkhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2573_10: anubhavati, na taṁ ativattati, evamayampi bhikkhu saṅgassa acchinnatāya pākatindriyo
atk-s0508a11:2573_11: viharanto vaṭṭadukkhaṁ nātivattatīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Taruṇavijātikā’’ti vā pāṭho. Abhinavappasutā
atk-s0508a11:2573_12: bālavacchāti attho. Taṁ sutvā so bhikkhu sañjātasaṁvego vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2576_0: Nagā nagaggesu susaṁvirūḷhāti āyasmato usabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppati? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2576_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni karonto ito ekatiṁse kappe
atk-s0508a11:2576_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle devaputto hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2576_3: dibbapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi. Sā pupphapūjā sattāhaṁ pupphamaṇḍapākārena aṭṭhāsi. Devamanussānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2576_4: mahāsamāgamo ahosi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2576_5: kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatti, tassa usabhoti nāmaṁ ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe
atk-s0508a11:2576_6: satthari laddhappasādo pabbajitvā katapubbakicco araññe pabbatapāde viharati. Tena
atk-s0508a11:2576_7: ca samayena pāvusakālameghe abhippavuṭṭhe pabbatasikharesu rukkhagacchalatāya ghanapaṇṇasaṇḍino
atk-s0508a11:2576_8: honti . Athekadivasaṁ thero leṇato nikkhamitvā taṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ pabbatarāmaṇeyyakañca
atk-s0508a11:2576_9: disvā yonisomanasikāravasena ‘‘imepi nāma rukkhādayo acetanā utusampattiyā vaḍḍhiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2576_10: pāpuṇanti, atha kasmā nāhaṁ utusappāyaṁ labhitvā guṇehi vaḍḍhiṁ pāpuṇissāmī’’ti cintento –
atk-s0508a11:2579: Vivekakāmassa araññasaññino, janeti bhiyyo usabhassa kalyata’’nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2581_0: Tattha nagāti rukkhā, ‘‘nāgā’’ti keci vadanti, nāgarukkhāti attho. Nagaggesūti pabbatasikharesu.
atk-s0508a11:2581_1: Susaṁvirūḷhāti suṭṭhu samantato virūḷhamūlā hutvā parito upari ca sammadeva sañjātasākhaggapallavappasākhāti
atk-s0508a11:2581_2: attho. Udaggameghena navena sittāti paṭhamuppannena uḷārena mahatā pāvusameghena
atk-s0508a11:2581_3: abhippavuṭṭhā. Vivekakāmassāti kilesavivittaṁ cittavivekaṁ icchantassa, araññavāsena
atk-s0508a11:2581_4: tāva kāyaviveko laddho, idāni upadhivivekādhigamassa nissayabhūto cittaviveko laddhabboti
atk-s0508a11:2581_5: taṁ patthayamānassa, jāgariyaṁ anuyuñjantassāti attho, tenāha ‘‘araññasaññino’’ti.
atk-s0508a11:2581_6: Araññavāso nāma satthārā vaṇṇito thomito. So ca kho yāvadeva samathavipassanābhāvanāpāripūriyā,
atk-s0508a11:2581_7: tasmā sā mayā hatthagatā kātabbāti evaṁ araññagatasaññino nekkhammasaṅkappabahulassāti
atk-s0508a11:2581_8: attho. Janetīti uppādenti, puthutte hi idaṁ ekavacanaṁ. Keci pana ‘‘janentī’’ti paṭhanti.
atk-s0508a11:2581_9: Bhiyyoti uparūpari. Usabhassāti attānameva paraṁ viya vadati. Kalyatanti kalyabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2581_10: cittassa kammaññataṁ bhāvanāyogyataṁ. Svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Evaṁ thero imaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2581_11: gāthaṁ vadantoyeva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a11:2596_0: Duppabbajjaṁve duradhivāsā gehāti āyasmato jentattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a11:2596_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto
atk-s0508a11:2596_2: sikhissa bhagavato kāle devaputto hutvā nibbatti. So ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a11:2596_3: kiṁkirātapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2596_4: buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe jentagāme ekassa maṇḍalikarājassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2596_5: jentotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto daharakāleyeva hetusampattiyā codiyamāno
atk-s0508a11:2596_6: pabbajjāninnamānaso hutvā puna cintesi – ‘‘pabbajjā nāma dukkarā, gharāpi durāvāsā,
atk-s0508a11:2596_7: dhammo ca gambhīro, bhogā ca duradhigamā, kiṁ nu kho kattabba’’nti evaṁ pana cintābahulo
atk-s0508a11:2596_8: hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṁ satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ suṇi. Sutakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a11:2596_9: pabbajjābhirato hutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a11:2596_10: sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya arahattaṁ sacchākāsi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.16.21-24) –
atk-s0508a11:2601: ‘‘Ito ca navame kappe, rājā sattuttamo ahuṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2604_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhanto, ‘‘asakkhiṁ vatāhaṁ ādito mayhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2604_1: uppannavitakkaṁ chinditu’’nti somanassajāto vitakkassa uppannākāraṁ tassa ca sammadeva
atk-s0508a11:2606: ‘‘Duppabbajjaṁ ve duradhivāsā gehā, dhammo gambhīro duradhigamā bhogā;
atk-s0508a11:2607: Kicchā vutti no itarītareneva, yuttaṁ cintetuṁ satatamaniccata’’nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2609_0: Tattha duppabbajjanti appaṁ vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca pahāya
atk-s0508a11:2609_1: imasmiṁ sāsane uraṁ datvā pabbajanassa dukkarattā dukkhaṁ pabbajanaṁ, dukkarā pabbajjāti
atk-s0508a11:2609_2: duppabbajjaṁ. Veti nipātamattaṁ, daḷhattho vā ‘‘pabbajjā dukkhā’’ti . Gehañce āvaseyyaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2609_3: duradhivāsā gehā, yasmā gehaṁ adhivasantena raññā rājakiccaṁ, issarena issarakiccaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2609_4: gahapatinā gahapatikiccaṁ kattabbaṁ hoti, parijano ceva samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca saṅgahetabbā,
atk-s0508a11:2609_5: tasmiṁ tasmiñca kattabbe kariyamānepi gharāvāso chiddaghaṭo viya mahāsamuddo viya
atk-s0508a11:2609_6: ca duppūro, tasmā gehā nāmete adhivasituṁ āvasituṁ dukkhā dukkarāti katvā duradhivāsā
atk-s0508a11:2609_7: durāvāsāti. Pabbajjañce anutiṭṭheyyaṁ dhammo gambhīro, yadatthā pabbajjā, so pabbajitena
atk-s0508a11:2609_8: adhigantabbo paṭivedhasaddhammo gambhīro, gambhīrañāṇagocarattā duddaso, duppaṭivijjho
atk-s0508a11:2609_9: dhammassa gambhīrabhāvena duppaṭivijjhattā. Gehañce āvaseyyaṁ, duradhigamā bhogā
atk-s0508a11:2609_10: yehi vinā na sakkā gehaṁ āvasituṁ, te bhogā dukkhena kasirena adhigantabbatāya duradhigamā.
atk-s0508a11:2609_11: Evaṁ sante gharāvāsaṁ pahāya pabbajjaṁyeva anutiṭṭheyyaṁ, evampi kicchā vutti no
atk-s0508a11:2609_12: itarītarena idha imasmiṁ buddhasāsane itarītarena yathāladdhena paccayena amhākaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2609_13: vutti jīvikā kicchā dukkhā, gharāvāsānaṁ duradhivāsatāya bhogānañca duradhigamatāya
atk-s0508a11:2609_14: gehe itarītarena paccayena yāpetabbatāya kicchā kasirā vutti amhākaṁ, tattha kiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2609_15: kātuṁ vaṭṭatīti? Yuttaṁ cintetuṁ satatamaniccataṁ sakalaṁ divasaṁ pubbarattāpararattañca
atk-s0508a11:2609_16: tebhūmakadhammajātaṁ aniccatanti, tato uppādavayavantato ādiantavantato tāvakālikato
atk-s0508a11:2609_17: ca na niccanti ‘‘anicca’’nti cintetuṁ vipassituṁ yuttaṁ. Aniccānupassanāya siddhāya
atk-s0508a11:2609_18: itarānupassanā sukheneva sijjhantīti aniccānupassanāva ettha vuttā, aniccassa dukkhānattatānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2609_19: abyabhicaraṇato sāsanikassa sukhaggahaṇato ca. Tenāha – ‘‘yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2609_20: yaṁ dukkhaṁ tadanattā’’ti (saṁ. ni. 3.15), ‘‘yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ
atk-s0508a11:2609_21: nirodhadhammaṁ’’ (mahāva. 16; dī. ni. 2.371; saṁ. ni. 5.1081), ‘‘vayadhammā saṅkhārā’’ti
atk-s0508a11:2609_22: (dī. ni. 2.218) ca tadaminā evaṁ aññamaññaṁ paṭipakkhavasena aparāparaṁ uppanne vitakke
atk-s0508a11:2609_23: niggahetvā aniccatāmukhena vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā idāni katakicco jātoti dasseti. Tena
atk-s0508a11:2609_24: vuttaṁ ‘‘attano paṭipatti’’ntiādi. Idameva therassa aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2612_0: Tevijjohaṁmahājhāyīti āyasmato vacchagottattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2612_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalabījaṁ ropento vipassissa
atk-s0508a11:2612_2: bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ raññā
atk-s0508a11:2612_3: nāgarehi ca saddhiṁ buddhapūjaṁ katvā tato paraṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2612_4: buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, tassa vacchagottatāya
atk-s0508a11:2612_5: vacchagottotveva samaññā ahosi. So viññutaṁ patvā brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ gato
atk-s0508a11:2612_6: vimuttiṁ gavesanto tattha sāraṁ adisvā paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā vicaranto
atk-s0508a11:2612_7: satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṁ pucchitvā tasmiṁ vissajjite pasannamānaso satthu santike
atk-s0508a11:2612_8: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2624: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:2627: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana’’nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2628_0: Tattha tevijjohanti yadipi maṁ pubbe tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāraṁ gatattā ‘‘brāhmaṇo tevijjo’’ti
atk-s0508a11:2628_1: sañjānanti, taṁ pana samaññāmattaṁ vedesu vijjākiccassa abhāvato. Idāni pana pubbenivāsañāṇādīnaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2628_2: tissannaṁ vijjānaṁ adhigatattā paramatthato tevijjo ahaṁ, mahantassa anavasesassa
atk-s0508a11:2628_3: samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa jhāpanato, mahantena maggaphalajhānena mahantassa
atk-s0508a11:2628_4: uḷārassa paṇītassa nibbānassa jhāyanato ca mahājhāyī. Cetosamathakovidoti cittasaṅkhobhakarānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2628_5: saṁkilesadhammānaṁ vūpasamanena cetaso samādahane kusalo. Etena tevijjabhāvassa kāraṇamāha.
atk-s0508a11:2628_6: Samādhikosallasahitena hi āsavakkhayena tevijjatā, na kevalena. Sadatthoti sakattho
atk-s0508a11:2628_7: ka-kārassāyaṁ da-kāro kato ‘‘anuppattasadattho’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.9; a. ni. 3.38)
atk-s0508a11:2628_8: viya. ‘‘Sadattho’’ti ca arahattaṁ veditabbaṁ. Tañhi attapaṭibandhaṭṭhena attānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2628_9: avijahanaṭṭhena attano paramatthaṭṭhena attano atthattā ‘‘sakattho’’ti vuccati. Svāyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2628_10: sadattho me mayā anuppatto adhigato. Etena yathāvuttaṁ mahājhāyibhāvaṁ sikhāpattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2631_0: Acchodikā puthusilāti āyasmato vanavacchattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2631_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalabījaṁ ropento vipassissa
atk-s0508a11:2631_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto parassa kammaṁ katvā jīvanto kassaci
atk-s0508a11:2631_3: aparādhaṁ katvā maraṇabhayena tajjito palāyanto antarāmagge bodhirukkhaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2631_4: tassa mūlaṁ sammajjitvā piṇḍibandhehi asokapupphehi pūjaṁ katvā vanditvā bodhiṁ abhimukho
atk-s0508a11:2631_5: namassamāno pallaṅkena nisinno māretuṁ āgate paccatthike disvā tesu cittaṁ akopetvā
atk-s0508a11:2631_6: bodhiṁ eva āvajjento sataporise papāte papati. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a11:2631_7: aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa
atk-s0508a11:2631_8: brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ‘‘vaccho’’tissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto bimbisārasamāgame
atk-s0508a11:2631_9: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.16.7-14) –
atk-s0508a11:2639: Te ca disvānahaṁ tattha, āvajjiṁ bodhimuttamaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2644: ‘‘Ito ca tatiye kappe, rājā susaññato ahaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2647_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā vivekābhiratiyā vaneyeva vasi, tena vanavacchoti samaññā udapādi.
atk-s0508a11:2647_1: Atha kadāci thero ñātijanānuggahatthaṁ rājagahaṁ gato tattha ñātakehi upaṭṭhiyamāno
atk-s0508a11:2647_2: katipāhaṁ vasitvā gamanākāraṁ sandasseti. Taṁ ñātakā, ‘‘bhante, amhākaṁ anuggahatthaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2647_3: dhuravihāre vasatha, mayaṁ upaṭṭhahissāmā’’ti yāciṁsu. Thero tesaṁ pabbatarāmaṇeyyakittanāpadesena
atk-s0508a11:2650: Ambusevālasañchannā, te selā ramayanti ma’’nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2651_0: Tattha acchodikāti acchaṁ abahalaṁ sukhumaṁ udakaṁ etesūti ‘‘acchodakā’’ti vattabbe
atk-s0508a11:2651_1: liṅgavipallāsena acchodikā’’ti vuttaṁ. Etena tesaṁ udakasampattiṁ dasseti. Puthusilāti
atk-s0508a11:2651_2: puthulā vitthatā mudusukhasamphassā silā etesūti puthusilā. Etena nisajjanaṭṭhānasampattiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2651_3: dasseti. Gunnaṁ viya naṅgulaṁ naṅguṭṭhaṁ etesanti gonaṅgulā, kāḷamakkaṭā, ‘‘pakatimakkaṭā’’tipi
atk-s0508a11:2651_4: vadantiyeva . Gonaṅgulehi ca pasadādikehi migehi ca tahaṁ tahaṁ vicarantehi āyutā
atk-s0508a11:2651_5: missitāti gonaṅgulamigāyutā. Etena tesaṁ amanussūpacāritāya araññalakkhaṇūpetataṁ
atk-s0508a11:2651_6: dasseti. Ambusevālasañchannāti pasavanato satataṁ paggharamānasalilatāya tahaṁ tahaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2651_7: udakasevālasañchāditā. Te selā ramayanti manti yatthāhaṁ vasāmi; te edisā selā pabbatā
atk-s0508a11:2651_8: vivekābhiratiyā maṁ ramayanti, tasmā tatthevāhaṁ gacchāmīti adhippāyo. Idameva ca
atk-s0508a11:2654_0: Kāyaduṭṭhullagarunoti āyasmato adhimuttattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? So kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a11:2654_1: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2654_2: gato kāmesu ādīnavaṁ disvā gharāvāsaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto
atk-s0508a11:2654_3: buddhuppādaṁ sutvā manussūpacāraṁ upagantvā satthāraṁ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṁ gacchantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2654_4: disvā pasannamānaso attano vākacīraṁ satthu pādamūle patthari. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2654_5: ñatvā tasmiṁ aṭṭhāsi. Tattha ṭhitaṁ bhagavantaṁ kāḷānusārena gandhena pūjetvā ‘‘samuddharasimaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2654_6: loka’’ntiādikāhi dasahi gāthāhi abhitthavi. Taṁ satthā ‘‘anāgate ito satasahassakappamatthake
atk-s0508a11:2654_7: gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā chaḷabhiñño bhavissatī’’ti byākaritvā
atk-s0508a11:2654_8: pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā tato yāvāyaṁ buddhuppādo, tāva
atk-s0508a11:2654_9: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a11:2654_10: adhimuttoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ gantvā tattha sāraṁ
atk-s0508a11:2654_11: apassanto pacchimabhavikattā nissaraṇaṁ gavesanto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2654_12: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a11:2654_13: arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.40.304-332) –
atk-s0508a11:2678: Asamo susamo santo, vasī tādī jitañjayo.
atk-s0508a11:2686: Vanditvā satthuno pāde, tuṇhī aṭṭhāsahaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a11:2688: Bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha.
atk-s0508a11:2698: Tatheva tvaṁ mahāvīra, dhammena tappayī mamaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2701: ‘‘Aho nūna sa bhagavā, ciraṁ tiṭṭheyya cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a11:2703: ‘‘Ayaṁ me pacchimā jāti, bhavā sabbe samūhatā;
atk-s0508a11:2708: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attanā saha vasante kāyadaḷhibahule bhikkhū ovadanto –
atk-s0508a11:2712_0: Tattha kāyaduṭṭhullagarunoti duṭṭhullaṁ asubhayogyatā, kāyassa duṭṭhullaṁ kāyaduṭṭhullaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2712_1: kāyaduṭṭhullaṁ garu sambhāvitaṁ yassa so kāyaduṭṭhullagaru, anissaraṇappañño hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2712_2: kāyaposanappasuto kāyadaḷhibahuloti attho, tassa kāyaduṭṭhullagaruno. Hiyyamānamhi
atk-s0508a11:2712_3: jīviteti kunnadīnaṁ udakaṁ viya jīvitasaṅkhāre lahuso khīyamāne. Sarīrasukhagiddhassāti
atk-s0508a11:2712_4: paṇītāhārādīhi attano kāyassa sukhena gedhaṁ āpannassa . Kuto samaṇasādhutāti evarūpassa
atk-s0508a11:2712_5: puggalassa samaṇabhāvena sādhutā susamaṇatā kuto kena kāraṇena siyā, ekaṁsato pana
atk-s0508a11:2712_6: kāye jīvite ca nirapekkhassa itarītarasantosena santuṭṭhassa āraddhavīriyasseva samaṇasādhutāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a11:2715_0: Esāvahiyyasepabbatenāti āyasmato mahānāmattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2715_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a11:2715_2: nibbattitvā brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ gato gharāvāsaṁ pahāya aññatarāya nadiyā tīre
atk-s0508a11:2715_3: assamaṁ kāretvā sambahule brāhmaṇe mante vācento viharati. Athekadivasaṁ bhagavā
atk-s0508a11:2715_4: taṁ anuggaṇhituṁ tassa asamapadaṁ upagacchi. So bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannacitto āsanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2715_5: paññāpetvā adāsi . Nisinne bhagavati sumadhuraṁ madhuṁ upanāmesi. Taṁ bhagavā paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0508a11:2715_6: heṭṭhā adhimuttattheravatthumhi vuttanayena anāgataṁ byākaritvā pakkāmi. So tena
atk-s0508a11:2715_7: puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a11:2715_8: sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mahānāmoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:2715_9: santikaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0508a11:2715_10: nesādake nāma pabbate viharanto kilesapariyuṭṭhānaṁ vikkhambhetuṁ asakkonto ‘‘kiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2715_11: me iminā saṁkiliṭṭhacittassa jīvitenā’’ti attabhāvaṁ nibbindanto uccaṁ pabbatasikharaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2715_12: abhiruhitvā ‘‘ito pātetvā taṁ māressāmī’’ti attānaṁ paraṁ viya niddisanto –
atk-s0508a11:2718: Nesādakena girinā, yasassinā paricchadenā’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2719_0: Tattha esāvahiyyaseti eso tvaṁ mahānāma avahiyyase parihāyasi. Pabbatenāti nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtena
atk-s0508a11:2719_1: iminā pabbatena. Bahukuṭajasallakikenāti bahūhi kuṭajehi indasālarukkhehi sallakīhi
atk-s0508a11:2719_2: indasālarukkhehi vā samannāgatena. Nesādakenāti evaṁnāmakena. Girināti selena. Selo
atk-s0508a11:2719_3: hi sandhisaṅkhātehi pabbehi ṭhitattā ‘‘pabbato’’ti, pasavanādivasena jalassa, sārabhūtānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2719_5: ‘‘pabbatenā’’ti vatvā ‘‘girinā’’ti ca vuttaṁ. Yasassināti sabbaguṇehi vissutena pakāsena.
atk-s0508a11:2719_6: Paricchadenāti nānāvidharukkhagacchalatāhi samantato channena, vasanaṭṭhānatāya vā
atk-s0508a11:2719_7: tuyhaṁ paricchadabhūtena. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – mahānāma, yadi kammaṭṭhānaṁ vissajjetvā
atk-s0508a11:2719_8: vitakkabahulo hosi, evaṁ tvaṁ iminā chāyūdakasampannena sappāyena nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūtena
atk-s0508a11:2719_9: nesādakagirinā parihāyasi, idānihaṁ taṁ ito pātetvā māressāmi, tasmā na labbhā vitakkavasikena
atk-s0508a11:2719_10: bhavitunti. Evaṁ thero attānaṁ santajjentoyeva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2732: ‘‘Yo taṁ adāsi madhuṁ me, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
atk-s0508a11:2737: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:2748: ‘‘Vuṭṭhamhi deve caturaṅgule tiṇe, sampupphite dharaṇīruhe sañchanne;
atk-s0508a11:2749: Suññe ghare maṇḍaparukkhamūlake, vasāmi niccaṁ sukhito anāsavo.
atk-s0508a11:2750: ‘‘Majjhe mahante hīne ca, bhave sabbe atikkamiṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2751: Ajja me āsavā khīṇā, natthi dāni punabbhavo.
atk-s0508a11:2758_0: Chaphassāyatanehitvāti āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2758_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto piyadassissa bhagavato kāle nesādayoniyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2758_2: nibbattitvā tassa viññutaṁ pattassa vicaraṇaṭṭhāne aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe piyadassī
atk-s0508a11:2758_3: bhagavā taṁ anuggaṇhituṁ nirodhasamāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. So ca mige pariyesanto
atk-s0508a11:2758_4: taṁ ṭhānaṁ gato satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso bhagavantaṁ anto katvā kataṁ sākhāmaṇḍapaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2758_5: padumapupphehi kūṭāgārākārena sañchādetvā uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedento sattāhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2758_6: namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Divase divase ca milātamilātāni apanetvā abhinavehi chādesi.
atk-s0508a11:2758_7: Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anussari. Tāvadeva
atk-s0508a11:2758_9: devatā sannipatiṁsu, mahā samāgamo ahosi. Satthā anumodanaṁ karonto tassa devamanussesu
atk-s0508a11:2758_10: bhāviniṁ sampattiṁ imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvakabodhiñca byākaritvā pakkāmi. So tena
atk-s0508a11:2758_11: puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a11:2758_12: viññutaṁ patto tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū hutvā parāparagottatāya pārāpariyoti laddhasamañño
atk-s0508a11:2758_13: bahū brāhmaṇe mante vācento satthu rājagahagamane buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:2758_14: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a11:2784: Bhikkhusaṅghe ca sampatte, gāthā pabyāharī jino.
atk-s0508a11:2805: ‘‘Cīvare piṇḍapāte ca, cetanā me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a11:2814: Tassa dhammaṁ suṇitvāna, pattomhi acalaṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2820: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānavasena –
atk-s0508a11:2823: Aghamūlaṁ vamitvāna, patto me āsavakkhayo’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2824_0: Tattha chaphassāyatane hitvāti cakkhusamphassādīnaṁ channaṁ samphassānaṁ uppattiṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0508a11:2824_2: pahāya. Guttadvāro susaṁvutoti tato eva cakkhudvārādīnaṁ guttattā, tattha pavattanakānaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2824_3: abhijjhādīnaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ pavesananivāraṇena satikavāṭena suṭṭu pihitattā guttadvāro
atk-s0508a11:2824_4: susaṁvuto. Atha vā manacchaṭṭhānaṁ channaṁ dvārānaṁ vuttanayena rakkhitattā guttadvāro,
atk-s0508a11:2824_5: kāyādīhi suṭṭhu saññatattā susaṁvutoti evamettha attho veditabbo. Aghamūlaṁ vamitvānāti
atk-s0508a11:2824_6: aghassa vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlabhūtaṁ avijjābhavataṇhāsaṅkhātaṁ dosaṁ, sabbaṁ vā kilesadosaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2824_7: ariyamaggasaṅkhātavamanayogapānena uggiritvā santānato bahi katvā, bahikaraṇahetu
atk-s0508a11:2824_8: vā. Patto me āsavakkhayoti kāmāsavādayo āsavā ettha khīyanti, tesaṁ vā khayena pattabboti
atk-s0508a11:2824_9: āsavakkhayo, nibbānaṁ arahattañca. So āsavakkhayo patto adhigatoti udānavasena aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a11:2827_0: Suvilittosuvasanoti āyasmato yasattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2827_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa
atk-s0508a11:2827_2: bhagavato kāle mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ attano bhavanaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2827_3: netvā mahādānaṁ pavattesi. Bhagavantaṁ mahagghena ticīvarena acchādesi, ekamekañca
atk-s0508a11:2827_4: bhikkhuṁ mahaggheneva paccekadussayugena sabbena samaṇaparikkhārena acchādesi. So
atk-s0508a11:2827_5: tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle seṭṭhiputto
atk-s0508a11:2827_6: hutvā mahābodhimaṇḍaṁ sattahi ratanehi pūjesi. Kassapassa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a11:2827_7: samaṇadhammaṁ akāsi. Evaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a11:2827_8: bārāṇasiyaṁ mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti, yaso nāma nāmena paramasukhumālo.
atk-s0508a11:2827_9: ‘‘Tassa tayo pāsādā’’ti sabbaṁ khandhake (mahāva. 25) āgatanayena veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2828_0: So pubbahetunā codiyamāno rattibhāge niddābhibhūtassa parijanassa vippakāraṁ disvā
atk-s0508a11:2828_1: sañjātasaṁvego suvaṇṇapādukārūḷhova gehato niggato devatāvivaṭena nagaradvārena nikkhamitvā
atk-s0508a11:2828_2: isipatanasamīpaṁ gato ‘‘upaddutaṁ vata, bho, upassaṭṭhaṁ vata, bho’’ti āha. Tena
atk-s0508a11:2828_3: samayena bhagavatā isipatane viharantena tasseva anuggaṇhanatthaṁ abbhokāse caṅkamantena
atk-s0508a11:2828_4: ‘‘ehi, yasa, idaṁ anupaddutaṁ, idaṁ anupassaṭṭha’’nti vutto, ‘‘anupaddutaṁ anupassaṭṭhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2828_5: kira atthī’’ti somanassajāto suvaṇṇapādukā oruyha bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2828_6: nisinno satthārā anupubbikathaṁ kathetvā saccadesanāya katāya saccapariyosāne sotāpanno
atk-s0508a11:2828_7: hutvā gavesanatthaṁ āgatassa pitu bhagavatā saccadesanāya kariyamānāya arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2832: Nadī ca sandate tattha, supatitthā manoramā.
atk-s0508a11:2851: ‘‘Lābhā amhaṁ suladdhaṁ no, ye vasāma tavantike;
atk-s0508a11:2863: ‘‘Yo me annena pānena, sabbe ime ca tappayiṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2870: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a11:2874: Citake chattaṁ dhārenti, heṭṭhā chattamhi ḍayhatha.
atk-s0508a11:2876: Maṇḍape rukkhamūle vā, santāpo me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a11:2880_0: Atha bhagavā āyasmantaṁ yasaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ bāhuṁ pasāretvā ‘‘ehi bhikkhū’’ti āha. Vacanasamanantarameva
atk-s0508a11:2880_1: dvaṅgulamattakesamassu aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo vassasaṭṭhikatthero viya ahosi. So attano
atk-s0508a11:2883: Tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṁ, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana’’nti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2884_0: Tattha suvilittoti sundarena kuṅkumacandanānulepanena vilittagatto. Suvasanoti suṭṭhu
atk-s0508a11:2887_0: Abhisattova nipatatīti āyasmato kimilattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2887_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a11:2887_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto parinibbute satthari tassa dhātuyo uddissa saḷalamālāhi
atk-s0508a11:2887_3: maṇḍapākārena pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena tāvatiṁse nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2887_4: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sākiyarājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a11:2887_5: kimilotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto bhogasampattiyā sampanno viharati. Tassa ñāṇaparipākaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2887_6: disvā saṁvegajananatthaṁ anupiyāyaṁ viharanto satthā paṭhamayobbane ṭhitaṁ dassanīyaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2887_7: itthirūpaṁ abhinimminitvā purato dassetvā puna anukkamena yathā jarārogavipattīhi
atk-s0508a11:2887_8: abhibhūtā dissati, tathā akāsi. Taṁ disvā kimilakumāro ativiya saṁvegaṁ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a11:2889: ‘‘Abhisattova nipatati vayo, rūpaṁ aññamiva tatheva santaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2890: Tasseva sato avippavasato, aññasseva sarāmi attāna’’nti. –
atk-s0508a11:2892_0: Tattha abhisattovāti ‘‘tvaṁ sīghaṁ gaccha mā tiṭṭhā’’ti devehi anusiṭṭho āṇatto viya.
atk-s0508a11:2892_1: ‘‘Abhisaṭṭho vā’’tipi pāṭho, ‘‘tvaṁ lahuṁ gacchā’’ti kenaci abhilāsāpito viyāti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2892_2: Nipatatīti atipatati abhidhāvati na tiṭṭhati, khaṇe khaṇe khayavayaṁ pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0508a11:2892_3: Vayoti bālyayobbanādiko sarīrassa avatthāviseso. Idha panassa yobbaññaṁ adhippetaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2892_4: taṁ hissa abhipatantaṁ khīyantaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṁ. Rūpanti rūpasampadāti vadati.
atk-s0508a11:2892_5: Rūpanti pana sarīraṁ ‘‘aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṁsañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito
atk-s0508a11:2892_6: rūpaṁtveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.306) viya. Aññamiva tatheva santanti
atk-s0508a11:2892_7: idaṁ rūpaṁ yādisaṁ, sayaṁ tatheva tenevākārena santaṁ vijjamānaṁ aññaṁ viya mayhaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2892_8: upaṭṭhātīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Tadeva santa’’nti ca keci paṭhanti. Tasseva satoti tasseva
atk-s0508a11:2892_9: me anaññassa sato samānassa. Avippavasatoti na vippavasantassa, ciravippavāsena hi
atk-s0508a11:2892_10: sato anaññampi aññaṁ viya upaṭṭhāti idampi idha natthīti adhippāyo. Aññasseva sarāmi
atk-s0508a11:2892_11: attānanti imaṁ mama attabhāvaṁ aññassa sattassa viya sarāmi upadhāremi sañjānāmīti
atk-s0508a11:2892_12: attho. Tassevaṁ aniccataṁ manasi karontassa daḷhataro saṁvego udapādi, so saṁvegajāto
atk-s0508a11:2892_13: satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a11:2892_14: nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.56.42-48) –
atk-s0508a11:2894: Gahetvā saḷalaṁ mālaṁ, maṇḍapaṁ kārayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a11:2897: ‘‘Divā vā yadi vā rattiṁ, caṅkamanto ṭhito cahaṁ;
atk-s0508a11:2902: Arahattaṁ pana patvāpi thero attano purimuppannaṁ aniccatāmanasikāraṁ vibhāvento tameva gāthaṁ paccudāhāsi. Tenetaṁ imassa therassa aññābyākaraṇampi ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2905_0: Rukkhamūlagahanaṁpasakkiyāti āyasmato vajjiputtattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a11:2905_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto
atk-s0508a11:2905_2: ito catunavute kappe ekaṁ paccekasambuddhaṁ bhikkhāya gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a11:2905_3: kadaliphalāni adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni
atk-s0508a11:2905_4: katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṁ licchavirājaputto hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2905_5: nibbatti, vajjirājaputtattā vajjiputtotveva cassa samaññā ahosi. So daharo hutvā
atk-s0508a11:2905_7: satthu dhammadesanākāle vihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante nisinno dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a11:2905_8: satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2913_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā aparabhāge aciraparinibbute satthari dhammaṁ saṅgāyituṁ saṅketaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2913_1: katvā mahātheresu tattha tattha viharantesu ekadivasaṁ āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ sekhaṁyeva
atk-s0508a11:2913_2: samānaṁ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṁ dhammaṁ desentaṁ disvā tassa uparimaggādhigamāya ussāhaṁ janento –
atk-s0508a11:2916: Jhāya gotama mā ca pamādo, kiṁ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī’’ti. –
atk-s0508a11:2918_0: Tattha rukkhamūlagahananti rukkhamūlabhūtaṁ gahanaṁ, gahanañhi atthi, na rukkhamūlaṁ,
atk-s0508a11:2918_1: rukkhamūlañca atthi, na gahanaṁ, tesu rukkhamūlaggahaṇena ṭhānassa chāyāsampannatāya
atk-s0508a11:2918_3: janasambādhābhāvañca dasseti, tadubhayena ca bhāvanāyogyataṁ. Pasakkiyāti upagantvā.
atk-s0508a11:2918_4: Nibbānaṁ hadayasmiṁ opiyāti ‘‘evaṁ mayā paṭipajjitvā nibbānaṁ adhigantabba’’nti nibbutiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2918_5: hadaye ṭhapetvā citte karitvā. Jhāyāti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāya, vipassanābhāvanāsahitaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2918_6: maggabhāvanaṁ bhāvehi. Gotamāti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ gottena ālapati. Mā ca pamādoti
atk-s0508a11:2918_7: adhikusalesu dhammesu mā pamādaṁ āpajji. Idāni yādiso therassa pamādo, taṁ paṭikkhepavasena
atk-s0508a11:2918_8: dassento ‘‘kiṁ te biḷibiḷikā karissatī’’ti āha. Tattha biḷibiḷikāti viḷiviḷikiriyā,
atk-s0508a11:2918_9: biḷibiḷīti saddapavatti yathā niratthakā, evaṁ biḷibiḷikāsadisā janapaññatti kiṁ
atk-s0508a11:2918_10: te karissati kīdisaṁ atthaṁ tuyhaṁ sādheti, tasmā janapaññattiṁ pahāya sadatthapasuto
atk-s0508a11:2919_0: Taṁ sutvā aññehi vuttavisagandhavāyanavacanena saṁvegajāto bahudeva rattiṁ caṅkamena
atk-s0508a11:2919_1: vītināmento vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā senāsanaṁ pavisitvā mañcake nipannamattova arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a11:2922_0: Pañcakkhandhāpariññātāti āyasmato isidattattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a11:2922_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a11:2922_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ rathiyaṁ gacchantaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2922_3: disvā pasannamānaso madhuraṁ āmodaphalaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a11:2922_4: aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde avantiraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a11:2922_5: vaḍḍhagāme aññatarassa satthavāhassa putto hutvā nibbatti, isidattotissa nāmaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a11:2922_6: So vayappatto macchikāsaṇḍe cittassa gahapatino adiṭṭhasahāyo hutvā tena buddhaguṇe
atk-s0508a11:2922_7: likhitvā pesitasāsanaṁ paṭilabhitvā sāsane sañjātappasādo therassa mahākaccānassa
atk-s0508a11:2922_8: santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a11:2928_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā ‘‘buddhupaṭṭhānaṁ gamissāmī’’ti theraṁ āpucchitvā anukkamena
atk-s0508a11:2928_1: majjhimadesaṁ gantvā satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinno , ‘‘kacci,
atk-s0508a11:2928_2: bhikkhu, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīya’’ntiādinā satthārā katapaṭisanthāro paṭivacanamukhena,
atk-s0508a11:2928_3: ‘‘bhagavā tumhākaṁ sāsanaṁ upagatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhaṁ sabbadukkhaṁ apagataṁ, sabbo
atk-s0508a11:2931: Dukkhakkhayo anuppatto, patto me āsavakkhayo’’ti. – gāthaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a11:2932_0: Tattha pañcakkhandhā pariññātāti pañcapi me upādānakkhandhā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0508a11:2932_1: maggapaññāya ‘‘idaṁ dukkhaṁ, ettakaṁ dukkhaṁ, na ito bhiyyo’’ti sabbaso paricchijja
atk-s0508a11:2932_2: ñātā, na tesu kiñcipi pariññātabbaṁ atthīti adhippāyo. Tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakāti sabbaso
atk-s0508a11:2932_3: pariññātattā eva tesaṁ avijjātaṇhādikassa mūlassa samucchinnattā ariyamaggena pahīnattā
atk-s0508a11:2932_4: yāvacarimacittanirodhā te tiṭṭhanti. Dukkhakkhayo anuppattoti chinnamūlakattāyeva
atk-s0508a11:2932_5: ca nesaṁ vaṭṭadukkhassa khayo parikkhayo anuppatto, nibbānaṁ adhigataṁ. Patto me
atk-s0508a11:2932_6: āsavakkhayoti kāmāsavādīnaṁ sabbesaṁ āsavānaṁ khayante abhigantabbatāya ‘‘āsavakkhayo’’ti
atk-s0508a11:2932_7: laddhanāmaṁ arahattaṁ pattaṁ paṭiladdhanti attho. Keci pana antimāyaṁ samussayo’’ti
atk-s0508a11:2932_8: paṭhanti. Nibbānassa adhigatattāyeva ayaṁ mama samussayo attabhāvo antimo sabbapacchimako,
atk-s0508a11:2932_9: natthi dāni punabbhavoti attho. Yaṁ pana tattha tattha avuttaṁ, taṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānaṁyevāti.
